price_level_y: this is interesting  as it appears to be be under new ownership  it has a new paint job on the front  i have not taken time to speak with the new managers  in the past few years i know of people who have did extended vacations as the prices were reasonable  access in the local community offers many things  i live across the street  there is a bus route to centro up the hill and return from centro down the hill  they have a few rooms for family or long term  i have seen buses unload and many people take over the hotel in the past  time will tell   comfortable and decent  it is minutes from the beach nthe water heater does not work and neither does the internet  but good for spending the night  very good cows in guadalajara  very good  change of administration and they did not make the deposit valid according to why the past administration did not give it to them  i had no other choice than to stay there since according to what i had booked and i had about people obviously i would not find a hotel elsewhere nwe did not pull the boiler  the minisplit  the wifi  they left only the maintenance man who could not cope with rented rooms that all had problems and to finish there were lizards all over the hotel  it is not close to the beach and the closest is private and not close to the main avenue  i just went on july and what i am sure i will not return again  maybe it was my fault for wanting something cheaper nbetter for the other one even if it is something more expensive but worth it

price_level_y: not the best experience i had our room smell like cigarette  clean place  prices not the best   i would rent it again without a doubt   safe to live  bad experience n nterrible place  you call and they give you a price and then when they send you an email to confirm it  they upload it and the owner supports himself with it  they do not let you visit the rooms either you stay or you don  t stay  so says the owner  the fans barely move and there is no weather  the refrigerator in room is in terrible condition  check everything well at the time of delivery since from my experience more than trying to provide a good service they only look for pretexts to charge extras besides everything they ask you to leave everything as you found it  in conclusion i would never return to that place  the owner has the worst dealings with people

price_level_y: great stay please come and try it you will relax at a very cheap rice   i have stayed twice  practical  simple  and next to airport and marina vallarta an exclusive sector of the city with dozens of restaurants   the location and price were a plus  for me the room was very small but that is reflected in the price  i thought the  many choices available for breakfast were great the only negative for me was going in and out of the hotel when i first arrived i could not see how to get to the lobby the staff was always very helpful  very good value for the price our room was clean and modern although a bit impersonal for mexico the main attraction of the hotel is its walking distance to the airport  but the public bus stop just out front makes the downtown very accessible too groceries available at the soriana supermarket next door   clean  quiet place to stay for the night before after a flight  has all your basic needs covered good value

price_level_y: nice place  must be fairly new  this is a low budget hotel with soft comfortable beds  every bit as comfortable as comfort in  rooms are very clean staff is very helpful hot water works well  let water run for a minute or   no air in the room we stayed in but alot cooler in room than outside stayed there with children youngest being and years old all had a good night we will definitely be back close to airport located behind best western little restaurants and stores within a few blocks   it is a place really with  b  the only problem is the street to enter but outside of there very beautiful nand the attention they provide is super good  the attention of the boys was excellent   very predisposed at all times   the rooms lack some warmth   and the vents in the rooms are not the best excellent place with very affordable prices  very comfortable rooms recommended for sales agents and people passing through  with ample parking  room that fulfills its mission  i give it stars for the lack of air conditioning  not so necessary since it is compensated by the ceiling fan and the air intake that it has in the upper part of the door entrance  outside of that  the location and for   i think it is an excellent option and it is worth mentioning the kindness of the person at the reception

Beautiful music selection, lighting on point and the food was ü§§ I‚Äôm pregnant and they brought me seconds and thirds even and kept my sparkling water glass full! Moreau', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113939096990208546653/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-RjnFyE4dRgI/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnrl1nxhlzqiJGbv8bAXVAt2VUhBQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'One of the most beautiful venues in Puerto Vallarta with potential for excellence if changes are made. Staff is friendly and tries hard but needs more organization and training. Food was artfully presented but quality was terrible. Surf and turf was was the fixed menus choice. Steak was tough and served well done (no other option given). Lobster was the same consistency as the mashed potatoes.... Mushy and uneatable. These observations were shared by all surrounding us so not a one off. \nThe owner/partner should remove himself from the business and hire a professional that knows what he is doing. Until this happens it is unlikely that this restaurant will achieve the success that the venue deserves.\nIn the meantime I would suggest trying it for breakfast as this is a meal that is hard to screw up and you can still enjoy the venue', 'time': 1518898513}, {'author_name': 'Donald Ewing', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109323307943696172289/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-lVBcdOWgUWQ/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclAuG-i9t2CGsRY90N9Oub-oW6NqQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'The restaurant is beautiful, just to bad the food was not equally as good.  I had the Salmon and it was okay my wife had the red snapper and it was in eatable, it was dry and tough.  Another couple had the grilled shrimp and half of the shrimp still had the shell on.  The staff was attentive and tried to make the best of a bad situation.  We were given after dinner drinks complimentary.', 'time': 1520795433}]

price_level_x: Avenida Paseo de la Marina Sur 159, Puerto Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Russell Smith', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102387577618758564419/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-bgxUgNze0Ek/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclPbHshy42ZvalcnNGgwRhJZogsfg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'Use caution when booking here.  The standard contract is one sided giving no protection to the renter.  Each condo has its own owner and different rental agents ply their trade here.  The minimum stay here is for three months as per condo association regulations.  The condition of a condo varies widely.  Very widely!  I rented a two bedroom two bath unit what was received dirty.  Finger nail clippings body hair were everywhere.  Screens, fans and windows had not been washed in some time.  Lack of screens in some windows allowed for numerous small animals to wonder about.  The cockroaches were large and numerous. The washing machine did not work and was replaced after two weeks.  The rental agent failed to pay for internet service three times during the stay, once for more that a week.  Most distressing is the failure to obtain the security deposit back after two months which was promised numerous times.  Poor maintenance lead to waking up one morning to finding the apartment flooded with two inches of water.  Stuff happens but this was too much.', 'time': 1527270477}, {'author_name': 'Von Nizzle', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115265866803895494863/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-6bkzydWxBio/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckct0kE0qdKgmgT5VderyhZzLDefw/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Excellent place to live.', 'time': 1560136469}, {'author_name': 'Diego Gutierrez', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115406559283921820815/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjTTYPpcjwnABsrJZAr0vNu-KBeiLbaT22KiACWVgw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'Great and very calm family place', 'time': 1531971178}, {'author_name': 'Israel Sandoval', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118140425187933377014/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgRot7p7HAaHUoViRpgYHxgd12s9W3YEJx1FM2DRw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '3 years ago', 'text': 'Was certificado clean', 'time': 1503623529}, {'author_name': 'Angel Abad', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113381394376848899872/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Ght6NyJ8-8qDRZyI-LnFv9XTiX14-5-2SXpIZMaVw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '3 years ago', 'text': 'Cool', 'time': 1501128062}]

Has a huge pool and diving pool that look out into the ocean.', 'time': 1555734494}, {'author_name': 'Judy Pauletich', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117971201248300634213/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-pmdB1F6S9Vk/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnl7QHRSfx4jhXnCRMmm1r6fTYGGg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Quiet environment', 'time': 1583501756}, {'author_name': 'May Hansen', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104291140924759780392/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GirWnafuDISeW_5oB4lXVW5G6ONDi2boElVQDxc-w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'is the glass half full or half empty? 
the only thing I miss about this hotel is "reliable" wifi 
If you ask my children, they will say this is the most perfect place in the world. for the price. this is A GREAT PLACE! 

- huge nice pool, not overcrowded. perfect for inflatable toys :-P 
- Nice balcony overlooking the pool and marina entry, where beautiful boats pass by all day. lovely to watch. 
- great kitchen with a blender, toaster, pots & pans for the stove, big fridge/freezer, 40 inch flatscreen
- air con in bedroom  and livingroom.
- safety box
- comfy bed
- nice and quiet location
- bus stops outside the hotel, so easy and very very cheap to get around. about 10 peso to go downtown. 
- only 5 min walk to the marina
- free access to the pool, restaurants, bars, beach etc. at the luxurious Regina Club across the street.
-  nice friendly and helpfull staff. 

My children and I would definitely return again :)

The Hansen family, Denmark.', 'time': 1549332067}, {'author_name': 'FNZ Diego', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117587677313072835249/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gi3Ig7wdsl3NteASxUPr6B31Ti1tevv36nxXrWbXg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '4 months ago', 'text': 'Alright', 'time': 1587498151}, {'author_name': 'Stryker Soto', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113672187053580414801/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhN391zwIRjSCmxDBeAiDr0hpKdoSyUP8v-OCjesQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '3 years ago', 'text': 'The best pool... only for members.', 'time': 1492095921}]

[{'author_name': 'Patrick Kieffer', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109634822450548480505/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjPTPoQR3Pqe583KkiDhYtEs6AmG6Lj_H5a94E3Yw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'in the last week', 'text': "We were meant to stay here for a friend's wedding this past June, but unfortunately the event was cancelled due to Covid19. price_level_y: we were meant to stay here for a friend s wedding this past june  but unfortunately the event was cancelled due to  although we were initially told we would receive a refund  or at least credit to use when the wedding is rescheduled  the hotel went back one their promise and has now refused any reasonable action in response to the pandemic cancellation  when we are able to travel to puerto vallarta and celebrate with our friends  it won t be at this resort  nor will we stay at a westin or associated hotel  we understand needing policies  and everyone is struggling  but keeping your word to the customer is pretty basic   not what i expected when i booked a westin  lobby was nice rooms were very dated  pool closed super early pay a couple bucks more for a nicer place   excellent location  hotel and services  staff and management awesome safe clean and tight covid compliance  maria chief of rooms manager even sent us an unrequested anniversary desert  awesome place and value right now  come stay at the westin pv  you ll love it   amazing place to stay  great service excellent prices ni can t wait to come back  the pools are amazing  you won t  regret your stay  if anybody is trying to find good deals for hotels visit roombully com booked a hotel on there and they had the best rates anywhere  n nlocated in the beach close to marina and airport there is plenty to do close by  if you want to do nothing the beach and pool area is great with good service overlong drinks to wherever you decide to hang out for the day  staff was extremely helpful and friendly

opening_hours: Mayan Palace at Vidanta Puerto Vallarta
price_level_x: Avenida Paseo de la Marina Sur 220, Marina Vallarta, Puerto Vallarta
rating_y: Mayan Palace at Vidanta Puerto Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Icer 2007', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111958928478000359213/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-YAnnW1s0FbU/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnaJGzYcgkFkYWDUVVW2QniV-_2RQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Not many options for food or entertainment.. thankfully close walking distance to marina shops and restaurants...room service made same mistake twice on a gluten free salad...and forgot one dish...also menu says room service stops at 11pm and the kitchen stops  taking orders at 1030pm', 'time': 1581217243}, {'author_name': 'Amy McRae', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115999761943032078891/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-sM42522Tdi8/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclzb0xLV_QLioGkHk6RvoLcNCVa0A/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4/photo.jpg', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'Nice facility.  Typical timeshare sales pitch. Charges on your bill that have to be challenged,  including coffee and water in condo and involuntary donation.

No one consumed the in room coffee or water. No one signed up for a donation. Seeing those things on the bill reminds us to verify every charge.  The Mayan palace did remove those charges.', 'time': 1583892563}, {'author_name': 'Heidi Carignan', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117929130669547890992/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-z0Fh92sHKdU/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnNlgNe7ZcdDJx-xxCP4UhiC1V4nQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Lovely small clean resort with beautiful views, staff is friendly and helpful.  Love that you can step off the resort and walk to the marina restaurants and shopping.  Right on the bus line to go downtown.....this is our favorite Vidanta Resort!', 'time': 1582751687}, {'author_name': 'Brent Peterson', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102492006082749179461/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiEBewvTkPJ0nrEe1ZgwSKeZFCOqU-kLFZGNmjSGg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': "We have stayed at Vidanta's Riviera Maya resort in the past. This resort is much smaller with less amenities...and is clearly an older facility.

That said, the staff are great, the place is kept amazingly clean and the room is comfortable with a great bed.

On top of that, the location is outstanding with dozens of shops, cafes and restaurants in easy walking distance. If you want to go farther, there is a bus stop right out front with no-transfer routes running all the way to downtown.", 'time': 1581476250}, {'author_name': 'Trevor Girodat', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117044907812203454576/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-TVSmTSvUJNw/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnYVJfB1Y-4aavwu9nux6D2_VmMhg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4/photo.jpg', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Accomodations are large enough, bright and clean.  We had 3 adults and 2 children in a 1 bdrm with a kitchen and it was fine. Couches have trundle beds under them. Kitchen has 2 small cooktops, small microwave and under counter fridge. Dining room table for 6.
Everyone loved the pool and amenities at the pool (bar, grill and towel/activity depot)  family pool is huge, and adult pool is adequate.  Happy hour from 11am to 3pm provides 2 for 1 drinks (which are normally $7-$9 Canadian each) cashless society - charge all to room and pay at checkout (condo).  Lots of tables and chairs and umbrellas. Beachfront property.beach is great... Can stroll from resort to resort along beach.  Food is great, shops are expensive, older crowd.
Great time had by all!', 'time': 1582837610}]

user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Joshua Slayton', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103882628910660145599/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhrdA3qk0-4kNclNW5rQNAwFjdlKp_XS9eIQQIxpg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'We didn‚Äôt actually get to go out on the boat we rented, but I wanted to give them five stars for being super accommodating and kind. We made a last-minute reservation to take a boat to Sayulita. When we woke up the next day and drove over to the marina, my friend started puking (travel sickness, I guess). They were very understanding about the cancellation and even let her camp out in their bathroom until she was ready to get in a car again. Will be back sometime in the future hopefully! Thanks Omar and friends', 'time': 1555786330}, {'author_name': 'sam groth', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105832153344370118289/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-pPgsZ28jh7E/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckuP4miJ-RvTSLHf-1xJLyana6YHg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Serafin and his boys are the man. Anyone who gives this place is a bad review is a lame. They know how to find the fish without fish finders *cough* @PattRutlidge *cough*. \nBest fishing experience ever', 'time': 1559089631}, {'author_name': 'Dan Groth', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110197274804835582237/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-MA4j5LaFTiQ/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnQ-PaCcmsyPK1VwKDfOTucSBwP0w/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "For nearly five decades I have been fishing.  For as long as i can remember I have been trying to catch a marlin.  I have been on over two dozen fishing trips or excursions.  I have been on boats where we caught the limit  and where we have caught big fish.  I have been on boats with great crews and captains.  But I have never been on a trip like this.  When we started talking to Serafin outside the office, I knew we had the right crew.  They worked with us on the price and helped pick out a great boat and crew for us.  Serafin took the time to make sure we understood everything about the trip.  Then he took us down to the deli and ordered lunch for us for the next day (it was delicious).  He reminded us to bring  beer, pop, and snacks.  They took care of the water and ice.  From the moment we set foot on the boat, Pablo and his mate were great.  When it started to drizzle, they had foul weather gear for us.  When it came time to eat we all shared our food.  When I realized my dream and caught a marlin, we had a cerveza or two.  When my son then caught a bigger marlin we had a cerveza and a laugh or two.  All in all, great crew, great trip, and the best time I have ever had on a fishing boat.  Muchas gracias to Serafin, Pablo and our first mate (whose name I am embarrassed to say I forgot).  Take my advice and go with Charly's, you will have a great time.", 'time': 1559905822}, {'author_name': 'shawn eggermont', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118013146980274666577/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-5GObljLsYOU/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucljlVodrElPT5xLh5nMAsqHiShCOg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "Jose and Juan took us out today and it was absolutely amazing, hands down the best birthday gift ever! I would highly recommend Charley's Sport Fishing to anyone who is an expert fisherman to someone who has never fished before! We will definitely be back again!", 'time': 1536687040}, {'author_name': 'Co Co', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117779127336291541626/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-x-u0divZzLg/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclhPjsLVDwnUOQbiXM9_fVxQeUY_g/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '3 years ago', 'text': 'We ladies had a great time going out on a boat with Poncho and his nephew. They were genuinely interested in ensuring we were enjoying ourselves. They took us everywhere we wanted to go! And Charley personally escorted us to the boat! Thanks guys!', 'time': 1491623113}]

user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Alan Thomas', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110487982470330925828/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-Bxx4H5oEREc/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucl-BOGsC53NUWKEHnVeYK-c1C4RyA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "Vacationed in PV in June and hurricane Bud was offshore. We were planning a sailing charter through Perfecto at Vallarta Tours. He introduced me to Captain Pablo and his 42' vessel. I told him we wanted to plan a 4 hour evening cruise for 3, but wanted to be certain the weather was going good. We went at 4 and he told us the harbor master closed the bay due to bad weather. Should reopen at 6. Went back at 6 and weather was great. We set sail with Pablo and his brother and had an unforgettable tour. We motored to the arches where we went snorkeling with throngs of beautiful fish. Got back in the boat and went under sail for the return. Got very close to shore and saw all the areas in PV.  Such a great cruise with enjoyable conversation with the small crew. Highly recommend them for a safe, relaxing evening on the high seas.", 'time': 1544752898}, {'author_name': 'Linda Vasquez', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117041728462998207493/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjWPoaWuEI0SruwLjNEe08ELIgcp9VKpljoNIWUlA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': "We've bought tickets for activities here in PV\n  Today Jesus (Chuy) took us for a private tour of San Sabastian. Plus we stopped for delicious homemade quesadillas, ice cream and amazing lunch at a restaurant named Rosa's: where he ordered for us to ensure we got a good variety of foods to taste.  We had a great time and have already purchased tickets for another activity.  \n  Prices are fair and he DOESN'T push timeshareüòé", 'time': 1527377065}, {'author_name': 'PEDRO H. FALERO', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115084575267120949036/reviews', 'language': 'es', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GitgDV1uJ3l2DYVVnMJmR28JyAEUvFE_feKYBkH5q0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '3 weeks ago', 'text': 'Execelente tours, lo pasamos de lo mejor!!!', 'time': 1597332009}, {'author_name': 'William Romero', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101381455759979535338/reviews', 'language': 'es', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gi8M5ES2zGKAowxicS6PtxJCQ9D4--vHD9F2GYU1g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'Ritmos De La Noche. user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Mauricio Jacinto', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109655326415340055311/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gj_eVMQJGRIKGC44rELogra5TLqaTe7DQnsFVNHTl8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': 'in the last week', 'text': 'Good hotel to stay, beautiful view and good food just need some more variety', 'time': 1598760334}, {'author_name': 'Josh Caldwell', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103803220796870016439/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-Z-LEdy0zTsg/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucklZ4ZoCRlEPF7wfRfZItq9yVXTrQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'This place is an absolute joke. After the first week we switched rooms.  The a/c finally worked in here!  However....there were many other issues.  Yet again the pool didn‚Äôt filter so we never ended up using it.  Just sat back there going to waste.  There was mold growing from the roof that started working it‚Äôs was down the ceiling.  Doesn‚Äôt look like that section had been cleaned in a very long time!  Some of the bricks around the back door were falling apart.  Had the same issue again with the bathtub turned into shower.  Water everywhere!  The other bathroom we had has spots of mold growing along the shower.  This place was just a freaken joke.  20 years ago it may have been a great place. Don‚Äôt waste your time coming here!', 'time': 1584592544}, {'author_name': 'Joanne Vieville', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107242679290534481146/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-683OFiQNV-0/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnBdQy1XENQcxOFeHouwM3c4VmPhQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'Not recommended! price_level_y: good hotel to stay  beautiful view and good food just need some more variety  this place is an absolute joke we ended up switching rooms because our first room was a joke the a c didn‚Äôt work  the pool filter didn‚Äôt work  some faucets had either only hot water or cold water couldn‚Äôt get both from a few of them the shower was what used to be a bathtub  and they just threw a shower head and a piece of glass in the front half to stop the water from coming out that didn‚Äôt work out too well and nothing was ever sealed off and water leaked everywhere  n nafter the first week we switched rooms the a c finally worked in here however  there were many other issues yet again the pool didn‚Äôt filter so we never ended up using it just sat back there going to waste there was mold growing from the roof that started working it‚Äôs was down the ceiling doesn‚Äôt look like that section had been cleaned in a very long time some of the bricks around the back door were falling apart had the same issue again with the bathtub turned into shower water everywhere the other bathroom we had has spots of mold growing along the shower this place was just a freaken joke   years ago it may have been a great place but it sure doesn‚Äôt seem like they did any maintenance on it and it is completely run down don‚Äôt waste your time coming here   not recommended  at best a star  poor quality food garden view which is a abandon lot across the street that has trees includes their garbage bins nnone of the amenities in room that were listed on website  most of the loungers are broken or delapidated   we absolutely loved the krystal  staff  food  entertainment and service was excellent  we cannot say enough about how awesome carlos and andres treated us at the bar  taxi drivers are plentiful  and only minutes to the hot spots in town  ask a local taxi driver to take you in a personal tour and it costs little to nothing  resort was safe  fun and kid friendly  washcloths should always be part of the bathroom amenities  along  with towels and hand towels  if you re supposed to get two bottles of water a day  you should get those two bottles of water

Plus the view over the shopping center was to DIE FOR, we even saw the beach from our rooms.', 'time': 1585527185}, {'author_name': 'Carol Long', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106919521252495827101/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gjo1V_Vb4igu7AlEoAb5XFOgGPym7qxbHVVrNww3ao=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'The entrance neatly tucked away in the mall and the entrance to the floors are secure.
Staff very courteous, welcoming and accommodating.
Enjoyed the few days we stayed there.', 'time': 1581191961}, {'author_name': 'Marcel Hohl', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114803305234283146353/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-KXNweTsBdVg/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmcepbuLaVMhaYtw7-tSPp_t4CvCA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': '10 minutes away from the airport, next to the La Isla mall. Our second Fiesta Inn on our trip and better than the previous one. Check in again friendly and fast. Room on 3rd floor. The room is very good, but I am not a fan to have the wash table direct in the Room. But that‚Äôs my personal opinion. Breakfast was good and the service as well. We had some drinks on the terrace and price and service were ok. Beer was about 70 pesos and strawberry milkshake was about 75 pesos. 
The pool and the deck chairs were good. Towels are available next to the pool. As all our Hotels in Mexico so far the rooms are noisy. You can hear everything from the floor or the nearby rooms. A Bus stop is direct in front of the mall.', 'time': 1583811158}, {'author_name': 'Adam Diemert', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109433803411293868600/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-C0_sScz20HU/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucllVUgpHfZDE0qHZqZqAoQChXQOeg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'Our hotel room smelled like smoke (like a lot) when we got back from the beach. We called the front desk so am they sent a maid with and aerosol can of air freshener... so it smell like a cheap casino. 

The hotel as a whole is like a low-budget airliner. Everything cost extra, even the pool furniture and hot tub! No joke it costs extra to sit in the hot tub by the pool. 

No thanks.', 'time': 1579479853}]

price_level_y: great atmosphere and rooms  in the mall complex about min walk to the end of the beach  we enjoyed the calmness of our stay  they follow all the hygiene measures  they sanitize all the rooms before delivering it and on the doors they have a label with the sanitization date  besides it has controlled access   in general  their service is always very good  possibly this was an isolated case anyway  unfortunately this time when i got to my room i realized that the sheets on my bed were not changed since they had hair and hair everywhere and they looked very dirty  they quickly changed my room and everything was fine   if i am a little concerned about their standards of cleaning and sanitation more than anything in this very unusual time in which we live   the signs to get to the hotel are terrible  not even in the parking lot there are signs indicating how to get to the hotel

user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Jeff Stewart', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103034093977258033933/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-P8UohU729zM/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclDYngebp48zlTErOori7Vmxok-xw/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '3 weeks ago', 'text': "The place was nice ..the wait staff nice. They think there culture is better...the town was rich Mexicans and the poor they don't help.   It was dirty smelly. The water was always cloudy with mud or plankton...which means too much pollution...we will never go back..", 'time': 1597326368}, {'author_name': 'MILANIE SARCIRON', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118246785478911716798/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-VSlo2b0k69U/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucllUG5QNgFB6cbsm-5QFYCffrn_7w/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4/photo.jpg', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': 'in the last week', 'text': "Average resort, drinks and food. Pictures are way better than what you will get in person. Rooms are big, with a fridge coffee machine and microwave but out dated. Wifi in lobby is terrible we tried to upgrade and were told we couldn't because we booked with Royal Holiday. Restaurant hours are different than stated on Website and aren't all open. The coffee shop is also not 24 hours as mentioned on their website. You get what you pay for at most this is a 3 star resort. Could get more value for your money somewhere else. Won't be back.", 'time': 1598809264}, {'author_name': 'Eduardo Hernandez', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116534502805911362830/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-fIv7Qjyui04/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckI6GMNuByEyEksGCC8OqsPQM5LRQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': "Great Place All inclusive, Very family oriented. Personel very attentive. Can't wait to go back and experience the new Kidd area.", 'time': 1596259029}, {'author_name': 'Ty Teague', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106906601899448502752/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-xDIHlZdBGak/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckvcs-OtawgM8S2z3H3d0cDR3WstQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '3 weeks ago', 'text': 'Always a great time at this resort. Omar and Miguel always take care of me and are great guys! Will be back!', 'time': 1597079832}, {'author_name': 'tanya Wentz', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101259372801387963739/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiqAEKGSYNTpv0c7gO-LfwaUz4O95phU1MnjSHsxg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': 'in the last week', 'text': 'I usually read reviews and can tell who is picky and just being negative. And I always give the benefit of the doubt. With that being said, Sunscape has to be the worst resort I\'ve ever stayed at in my life. I\'m a regular AM resort customer. I\'ve stayed at Secrets Wild orchid in Jamaica, Breathless in Punta Cana. Sunscape is the red head step child of the brand. This trip was for my 8year old daughter, so we chose a family resort. I will say the customer service was fantastic. Everyone willing to help, and friendly. But the property itself is run down. The website is full of lies and deciet. My expectations of an AMResort was totally underwhelmed. We had sun club "priveleges" which was supposed to be upgraded everything....that was a lie. Our room was ok to say the least. Our shower flooded into the bathroom next door. There was no microwave. No ironing board. Our view of the ocean  was distracted by the raggedy roof below and the back alley of the resort. The roof leaked in the restaurant where u eat. The roof leaked on you while trying to get your food and eat. Speaking of food. It was the absolute worst. Room service breakfast was the only thing we ate on the resort. Our first day we tried the tiki taco because we are in Mexico, of course we were hoping for authentic mexican food. It was the worst restaurant on the resort. The Italian restaurant was the best and it\'s only open certain days. We were supposed to have top shelf drinks. That was a lie. I don\'t know when absolute vodka became too shelf. Or Jose cuervo. The drinks that were "upgraded" were so slim to chose from. We left the resort everyday to eat and drink. We had to go into the town to find real top shelf liquor. One of the things I despised the most was the harrasment everyday from the women in the lobby trying to get us to sign up for unlimited vacation club. We tried to find a different route thru the hotel just so we didn\'t have to go thru the lobby and be harrased about a damn time share that we sat thru in dominican republic. I will say the women who cleaned our room were fantastic. Our room was clean everyday. They went the extra mile. There is one pool. No kids pool as described. There is no spa as described online. Everything we looked forward to doing on the resort was not available. The parking lot directly in front of the resort was piled with old carpet and a pile of rubbish in front of the basketball court. Overall I would not recommend sunscape in puerto vallarta. I was thoroughly disappointed with our stay. If it wasn\'t for the $800 in excursion we did off the resort my vacation would have been a complete and utter disaster. Thankfully we had the means to travel off the resort to eat and drink. Otherwise we would have starved. I won\'t be returning or recommending this property.', 'time': 1599060624}]

rating_y: Hotel Hacienda de Vallarta Las Glorias
user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'R Retano', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113663949736828984229/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjvpSTZ8IVyG57nkmh-U5RORM5wCP3tvzr0YWwiSbQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '8 months ago', 'text': 'Very nice, awesome personnel attending and decent price', 'time': 1577732522}, {'author_name': 'Joanne Kopp', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103439019543186140442/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-oMpVxXlLoZ8/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucm0qE-e8EAd7whnPs6AHAaB-dLhrQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "Everyone was so kind n helpful great place to stay very clean they made you feel like family they're highly recommend it", 'time': 1558020079}, {'author_name': 'Mary Gowins', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112174081841692484348/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiOmTkeWCNe2dLY_hOVzkGiw1fsLslWiGq6tArJgQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Wonder family hotel! Great people, comfortable rooms, beds and hot showers.', 'time': 1558923308}, {'author_name': 'Shaina Little', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108696171394760010600/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-WBZjEWNurW0/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmyFGEDWiegVRVP9b_zJ7jFBRntuA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'I think that when people are writing their reviews, they are not taking in to consideration that this is a hotel in Mexico. If you are looking for something perfect, look for a luxury hotel or a resort near the beach. It is quite old but very full of culture. The doors are not perfectly aligned, so you can see cracks to outside and yes maybe the design is not modern but other things outshine those "issue". The staff is very friendly and informative, breakfast is amazing, and the rooms are cleaned to perfection by housekeeping each and every day, the A/C is very nice and cold. The pool is spacious and very clean. Also, there are always buses driving by on the road in front of the hotel, so you never have to wait for more than a few seconds to catch one! My only complaint may be that the beds are rock solid, but it wasn\'t really that big of a deal. When I return to Puerto Vallarta, I will definitely stay here again!!', 'time': 1524667249}, {'author_name': 'Jairo B.', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109127783330787151117/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gjju-NYr9cxyGRlCA-mtnz4PkkJGyEuI2EwVmIpXQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "Nice room but we saw a small roach before we left. No washcloths.  We got soap but shampoo was a in a small plastic bag enough for one or two people. No phones in rooms. Wi-fi is spotty. Our room had a mini fridge but not all do. Good cold A/C. No lock on bathroom door. Nice big pool, not too deep. There was some noise due to remodeling. Not near the beach. Subway sandwich shop and grilled chicken place next door. Convenience store and pharmacy steps away. Lady at the front has good recommendations on family activities and where to eat. Good breakfast restaurant in hotel, it's open air 7 am to noon. Note that single bed rooms are on the second floor, two-bed rooms are on the first floor.", 'time': 1544752898}]

user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Patricia Albores', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107425264395112082420/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-mwbTE0wfqJk/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucn-S3kcXCWn1PV6TRJID241OQX6Xw/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'I totally love this place I never want to liveüò´ the staff is amazing', 'time': 1595181571}, {'author_name': 'Jennifer Schlink', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108783484743975316895/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gjua5ThowKSgDUGcobPqmvsikk_nUEq438RpXHV=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Do not travel to Canto del Sol during the COVID pandemic. Before booking our stay we called the hotel to find out what precautions they were taking. They assured us that the hotel would be at 30% capacity with masks and social distancing. We arrived on July 15th. Upon arriving we had to ask the Bellman to please put his mask on. In reception everything was fine, no lines, quick service and gel stations placed throughout. We changed and headed to the pool...the pool full of guests. There were no available lounge chairs. Flip flops and empty cups littered the ground. We were recommended to go to the kid‚Äôs pool, which was also full. We could not believe how many people were there. A guard at the pool told us that he counted 190 people in the pool and expected more tomorrow, that the place was full. We checked out of the hotel and because we had made our reservation with RCI Wyndham we were not refunded our money. We learned an expensive lesson: hotels want to make money and will tell you anything to get you to book a room.', 'time': 1594949152}, {'author_name': 'Airline Lush', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109812948613844934459/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgIgNdXhXJ0jhKIKsp47N4LVihoGTnVi3aHG5Kb9g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'Stayed here in 2011, walking distance to Wal Mart, beachfront is nice, watch  out for the rocks in the ocean, they will cut your legs up and start to bleed. The dining is top notch. I did know a canadian that got bad sickness the day of departure from the night before , we encountered each other while dining. I asked the italian resto to rempve my name from a reservation, this cancelled it and further ruined a friendship.   The horse ride from the beach was worth the money, make sure you have accident insurance and do not weigh too much, horses are not machines.

Been to a few locations in my life. However, I can‚Äôt get this hotel and the feeling I experienced in Puerto Vallarta out my heart.

Very clean hotel / room
Amazing staff
Great location
Funny and nice beach sales people (not annoying) 

If you are in Puerto Vallarta, try to find Carlos (adventures guide) best prices. His office is the beach, next to Canto Del Sol.', 'time': 1580831686}]

price_level_x: Boulevard Francisco Medina Ascencio 1737, Zona Hotelera Norte, Puerto Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Dale Douglas', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103320653359385033428/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiZwEN9YEqoEZieEuS-i0ERmywl5naqaZfakoVX6pM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'A three star property in the North Hotel Zone located on the beach.  The area offers good shopping and many places to eat within walking distance of the hotel.  It bills itself as an all-inclusive resort. \n I have a very strong, negative and non-negotiable  opinion about locking yourself and others you travel with into meal plan when booking a trip to Puerto Vallarta.  My reasoning is that there are so many excellent places to dine and dozens of places for every budget, fur every type of traveler including kids, and those on special diets  such as vegan or diabetic.  The majority of restaurants here deal with those situations on a regular basis. What l recommend is if someone is booking a trip here ask for the European Plan (EP) no meals included in hotel rate, or a Continental Plan (CP) which includes just a light breakfast.  You\'ll save money on the hotel portion and have the flexibility if experiencing a number of great local restaurants the area has to offer.  (See my list for recommended restaurants in "Discover Versalles Dining Guide").  The Costa Club offers a great location and reasonable rates, it\'s family friendly and a good choice if you are looking for value.  It\'s also kept up well in cleanliness and maintenance and the staff is incredibly kind and helpful and will do their best to insure a pleasant stay.', 'time': 1596150219}, {'author_name': 'Myrl Eddy', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110899328108183888363/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-r6qST4AhPyc/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmvEmK-ovA5_GmlbucL2qeBmZ1acA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'Friendly staff who work hard to please. Very tight towel control. Hot water unpredictable. Beach about 6 on scale of 1-10. Action in bar is minimal. Pools are well kept. Staff have very limited English. Lighting in room was minimal and no reading lamp.', 'time': 1580923213}, {'author_name': 'Jason Mcgillis', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112685077046383889032/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-s2_A9NcGqN4/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckv1EtY4X7iPoQT958Vk6YLaoSQXg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '4 months ago', 'text': 'Oh how i miss this resort my wife and i went loved it !!!totally would go again  the culture and the people are beautiful!!!!', 'time': 1586925029}, {'author_name': 'Christine Good', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100517459912983938816/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gi9BFl9uyMq7Zi0lQr_GCk4X5Ckb_Bcv6E00Dgp=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'Wifi is turned off at 9 am to 4 Monday to Friday so if you need to work buy a Sim card. Food is fresh and not bad rooms are OK.  Staff is fabulous.', 'time': 1583853527}, {'author_name': 'letty Hughlett', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100229852732335074053/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-KdTm7PHBggs/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclm8_SWbgjLOGs7Zxe7ZTsfoTaxCA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'Snack bar they treat us so good. Rigo bartender was super..make us feel at home.. the security Gabriel always alert make us feel safe..', 'time': 1580710691}]

price_level_x: David Alfaro Siqueiros 164, Las Glorias, Puerto Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Kelsey Little', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100905425430332193522/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjKbJXZIRgw51zh8PhSzpbOhH-ENGTgUikucPqo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'in the last week', 'text': 'This is the first large resort I will return to by choice. The landscaping and numerous pools gave you options. I also stayed in a ground suite attached to private pool and loved it!

Wheelchair users...their version of wheelchair accessible was great... but I was limited which floors had handicap rooms. Kept my non-handicap room by the pool and had to use the loo with the private door open, but was able to close the bathroom. 

Bad news is a jeweler that has a shop in the resort did a fake replacement pearl on my ring and took my $50! Prices are not marked and are different for some customers.', 'time': 1598942834}, {'author_name': 'Steve Bush', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117514899150416791950/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gi1eUbi1BMrrPe1l5OM-v6dORKDS1HSBeYCnbaQmg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '3 weeks ago', 'text': 'Great place... Most of the staff was great. One guy at the front desk told me it was told it was sold out, but I was able to book it on my phone through Booking.com. He also kept taking phone calls while I was right in front of him. Got a manager involved, and got it fixed. Pool is great. Rooms are well appointed.', 'time': 1597189822}, {'author_name': 'Rahul Narayan', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102013361716964208481/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Ghfv8Ug2CJXAdDvDEgthSZdL8Ng0-dDwXLBIuKQL3o=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Where should I start, Beautiful property and Location, and just 1 restaurant on the property is worth eating. And that's it.... Check in: experience was horrible, we booked 2 preferred ocean view double bed rooms all inclusive, the guy checking us in was giving us 1 ocean view and 1 garden view(garden view was at a cheaper rate, not what we paid for) after many back and forth they finally gave us the room we paid for, it's like they didn't want us to get the room we paid for. Rooms: 1 room was outstanding but the other room leaked water from the bathrooms to everywhere, and the A/C stopped working(it's hot, very hot). Food: First room service, when calling them to stock the mini bar and pantries, they were very hesitant. They were like you can only get 1 set of alchol per day, I have stayed at many all inclusives, first time hearing this from this hotel. The pan Asian restaurant were rushing through peoples orders and messed ours up, fed us steak when we clearly told the waiter we don't eat beef or pork against our religion. Pool bar food was below average. HOWEVER the Italian restaurant was amazing we ate there for 2 dinners. Breakfast at the Carnival restaurant was average. life&death experience: at the beach we were jet skiing when my wife fall into the water, luckily wearing a life jacket as she doesn't know how to swim, my brother-in-law went to look for help, someone from the neighboring resort came on a jet ski to help her get out of the water. After all that we approached the hotels beach life guide, and asked where was he,and If he didn't see us crying for help, he literally said,"I didn't see nothing" everyone on the beach sitting there saw us and was asking if we were okay, how did the life guard didn't see us? If it wasn't for the next door resort person I don't know what would have happen. Overall what made our stay worth while was the property location, when I come back to Puerto Vallarta, I will be definitely staying at another resort after my experience here.', 'time': 1595281821}, {'author_name': 'Brittany Laine', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109527359780035543768/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Ggq4PSCN0KxKijTu3pdiQdQL5RZU9ChWiY6DBpLCg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '4 months ago', 'text': "Really super clean resort. Buy your packages from the hotel to go out and ride ATVs n such, don't use the guys on the beach... Just buy hats from them haha..  Hotel rooms all had A/C, breakfast was all awesome. They were very accommodating and very nice when we had a tragic family incident here...", 'time': 1586535367}, {'author_name': 'lisa wood', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107430575215780985311/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-T2g7ulwApbc/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnjSVuZux2K3iw1cJ0BmoP7cUOdfw/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': "I actually work at this resort and it's sister hotel Secrets Vallarta Bay. I work in the resort not for the resort and can highly recommend it for families. The pools are clean and the food is fresh and varied. The kids club is great but teens will have to join in the adult entertainment program, e.g beach volleyball and water aerobics as although they have a teen area (core zone) there is no.specialized entertainment just for teens, vut belive me there is plenty to do. You could try doing SCUBA lessons in the pool (available from 8 years and up) or come to the Amstar tour desk and so activities outside.of the property.", 'time': 1595035399}]

price_level_x: David Alfaro Siqueiros 164, Las Glorias, Puerto Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Eric Donovan', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113667063756444937052/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhfcVLPBDfdrbcTgca27craeULdvRg5mdBGXQKI5BA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'For those requiring any flexibility in their travel, I recommend looking at other resorts. My wife and I made multiple attempts through phone and email to cancel our reservation.  We emailed several times and received no responses.  We also called and were unable to connect with an agent on one occasion and were transferred to a non existence voice mail on a different occasion. When we finally connected with an agent, we were told it would take between 90-120 days to receive a refund.', 'time': 1592238215}, {'author_name': 'Arun R', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102592473020885760384/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgFgueg5f1f_483tlZIsgcxvwDoJmazq4WDp0WmKQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'Check-in experience NOT Covid19 friendly. Self parking facility inside the premises inadequate. App based food delivery not allowed inside. Rooms and other facilities were quite good though.', 'time': 1594137190}, {'author_name': 'Dian De Silva', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102702423067896951305/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gh_11NgzkqFYab0E--I_tTivBrYlrzZi0iWRhZvVg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '3 weeks ago', 'text': "We booked the Breakfast Plan Junior Suite Swimout King for 4 nights.

1. The morning of day 1, our flight got canceled, and so we had to shift our arrival and departure forward one day. So I called Secrets to see what they could do to help. Sana at reservations department, was happy to adjust our check in and check out dates, to coordinate with our new flight schedule. That was the first good experience (and we hadn't even left the US yet!).

2. We stayed at Secrets to celebrate our anniversary, and my girlfriend's birthday. From the moment we got to the hotel, till when we said our goodbyes, the entire staff remembered and wished us happy anniversary and happy birthday, with decorating the room, the many little dessert plates, and drinks, etc.

3. The room was amazing!!! The couples tub, the comfortable bed, the view through the sliding windows, the long private pool (separate from the main pools, but shared between 5 total rooms), even the scented toilet tissue, was all breathtaking! Highly recommend the Swimout rooms!
Ps: There's a little iguana that hangs out there too lol

4. The Spa...... Omg..... The spa..... Words truly don't do it justice... If you're staying at this resort, you NEED to do the spa! Book a massage, and do the hydrotherapy! It's pretty f*kin awesome!

5. Dining was such a pleasure! We ate at the French cuisine restaurant, which had really yummy food and a great ambiance. But favourite was the breakfast! With endless options, it was hard to choose, but whatever we got, it tasted amazing. 

6. Lastly (and honestly the best experience of the entire resort), THE STAFF! Alejandra, Humberto, Edgar, Adrian, Carlos, Sandra, Maria, Alfonso, Ruben, and so many others that helped us (I'm so sorry I don't remember any more names), you are all beautiful and wonderful people! We love you all! You really made our stay feel like home, instead of some fancy place. The staff is all friendly, helpful, selfless, and simply care. Which speaks volumes on behalf of the hotel (I don't think the hotel would be what it is without this amazing, amazing staff!).

Thank you Secrets for everything. We'll definitely come back, and we're going to tell all our family and friends to stay at this resort!", 'time': 1597260590}, {'author_name': 'michael donnenwirth', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118224332621364021154/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-GBNmhtTPk1E/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnGraooKNgX7rgo5iFt6bqeWJLbiA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'Fantastic. Friendly staff and very clean.', 'time': 1575754523}, {'author_name': 'Pam Buckshon', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115078450360014827869/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Ggj7Er9OjwHMitd2usPADFldVWxL8NpO3oEq_7CPiU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "The staff are super, especially Anna Maria at the front desk. It's very good value here. Location could be good if only the area wasn't declining, noisy and smog-filled. Elevator is always available which is awesome and the pool area is quite nice. Plenty of nearby restaurants and transit is simple to navigate. La Canasta in the adjacent mall is a great and inexpensive place to grab breakfast and lunch. Nice and breezy in there too. 
The beds are surprisingly comfortable for the age and quality. Lobby furniture was being updated with new low quality stuff. I would have happily given a 4 or 5 star review if our bathroom hadn't smelled like sewage.
TIP ... Don't put anything in the dresser drawers. Aside from the fact that they fall out, your stuff will smell like mold when you get home. After a week of waiting, I finally put my stuff outside for a day or so and the smell went away.", 'time': 1551458676}]
price_level_y: this is a very well run establishment with lots of attentive staff and immaculate suites  add the fact that many suites have full kitchens and you have a real winner nunfortunately it seems to require constant maintenance to keep it looking spiffy and that means constant construction noise  bang bang bang grind hammer bang all day long for weeks at a time  as of this writing there has been hammering outside my apartment for a month  all day  every day  nthis is unacceptable for a hotel at this rate level or at any rate  as i said it s a nice building in a convenient location but if you want a relaxing vacation look elsewhere   beautiful hotel with very caring bilingual staff  we will go back   enjoyed it thoroughly prices were a bit high  but very good service and hotel  nice budget hotel  nlocated on a major intersection and can be very noisy  nfriendly staff and very clean   the staff are super  especially anna maria at the front desk  it s very good value here  location could be good if only the area wasn t declining  noisy and smog filled  elevator is always available which is awesome and the pool area is quite nice  plenty of nearby restaurants and transit is simple to navigate  la canasta in the adjacent mall is a great and inexpensive place to grab breakfast and lunch  nice and breezy in there too nthe beds are surprisingly comfortable for the age and quality  lobby furniture was being updated with new low quality stuff  i would have happily given a or star review if our bathroom hadn t smelled like sewage  ntip   don t put anything in the dresser drawers  aside from the fact that they fall out  your stuff will smell like mold when you get home  after a week of waiting  i finally put my stuff outside for a day or so and the smell went away

opening_hours: Secrets Hotel & Now Amber GRAN SALON
price_level_x: David Alfaro Siqueiros 487, Las Glorias, Puerto Vallarta
rating_y: Secrets Hotel & Now Amber GRAN SALON
user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': "KP's Google_Gmail", 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100421648106171911051/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-jQ65A5zGhio/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmeyNobC4a8uQiDJJR1AtN-wa7l4w/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '9 months ago', 'text': "Great location right on ocean about 15 min from airport.  Luxurious resort with friendly, courteous staff. 

3 different hotel rooms we entered had a strong musty smell, which was partially offset by a dehumidifier that the resort provided. Room was spacious and upscale. 

Food was pretty good. Ala carte restaurants had availability with no reservations required. Mixed drinks were weak but could be enhanced by ordering an extra shot of the same alcohol to add in. 

Smoking is allowed everywhere except hotel rooms and indoor restaurants. Bad part was that there weren't any designated non-smoking areas in public places.

Entertainment was very good. They have a casino with sports bar in it but no audio for sports game viewing. 

Watch out for upselling!!! From the moment we checked in to the time we checked out, the resort personnel tried to get us to spend money on food, drinks, services, spa, etc which were all severely over-priced.  ~$200 for a 60min massage when you could get one on the beach right next to the resort for $35.", 'time': 1575783299}, {'author_name': 'Susanne Dershaw', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106999537115352370345/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiYqGg99_EFUbUIn3jgzytcaIHizYcYtAiHr7u9tg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'Lovely resort. Good food, good service and nice clean rooms.', 'time': 1584468123}, {'author_name': 'Mark Brady', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115480176990627491477/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-_mHILp8NQjE/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclgxJ8pN0CfFSxehAH4lmJkO8o1-g/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '9 months ago', 'text': 'Stayed there twice now very nice place would recommend to all.', 'time': 1574026001}, {'author_name': 'Jeff Norminton', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108704742214201388520/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-ftB4PrVGsTQ/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucn_RXnEPTMo-PUrbhNj3MM0AxDksA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Absolutely spectacular :)', 'time': 1582307734}, {'author_name': 'Jav Me', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101114051853415057198/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-AaYABBSvhmY/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckowrN5IyccUMfNgraeAkm1izKd5g/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Think twice before coming here! Not a safe Resort! Came here with my sister hoping for a relaxing time but hours after our arrival my sister was drugged by another couple who befriended her. My sister had to be treated by a Doctor. I told the resort manager who drugged her but they failed to call the Police. They did kick them out of the resort but where not eager to call the police. I guess they didn‚Äôt want the attention. This might sound like a one sided rant but it‚Äôs true. We booked this trip though Costco Travel... I hope they don‚Äôt promote this place anymore.

**Update** so the manager, Fernando Ramirez, locked us out of our room until we signed a release of liability for the hotel. This is a low move on the hotels part. I guess they feel guilty and wanted to strong arm us into signing. Reluctantly I did. Again please don‚Äôt support this place until they change their policy regarding calling the police when a crime has been committed. Another reason to avoid Mexico.', 'time': 1544752898}]

rating_y: Villas Vallarta by Canto Del Sol Hotel
user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Gilles Desrosiers', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108619177360345665890/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiBpoNhDJpNYpc86onGeytAkbzs7CzdY7hwnkXxyw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Booked three months ago with one of the more popular Booking agencies. Requested , booked and paid dearly for a kitchenette and balcony for one month. When we got there and went to our room , all we had was a double bed with no kitchenette, no table and chairs, no kettle,no coffee maker and no balcony. We went straight to the front deck , canceled and walked out of the hotel after getting a quick refund and found found a much better one nearby. Buyer beware !! Happens often to a lot of people apparently,only in Mexico !!', 'time': 1595885626}, {'author_name': 'Gerardo Soto', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100617666641005976662/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-KonGeJQIOa4/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckahmfH-9BdUCJlLRx8L9BCIbp-7Q/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '3 months ago', 'text': 'Lots of pigeons droppings everywhere nkt ideal. Great shops thru out', 'time': 1591471995}, {'author_name': 'Lilia Villamil', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112837620026262077956/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-WloS8NfDiNU/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmTwS3L579emkA0qQQxoXOOSEdF3w/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': "Arrived here after traveling back and forth from P.V to Tlaquepaque and vicinity.  Not knowing where to stay (after my first reservation was done) decided to get help from a local travel agency. And oh boy! Can't  thank them enough for booking me at Villas Vallarta; I've  enjoyed my stay so much that I've  gone back 3 times (on Holidays) I'm  a solo traveler and always make sure the places I visit and stay, are:  safe, centric, clean,  reasonably priced, access to center of town,  amenities a plus, and I've  been quite lucky with staff so far. Food is tasty and abundant,   putting you on the right path for the day., this gives you the opportunity to visit the local Restaurants and treat yourself with delicious meals after spending your day shopping for souvenirs, walking through town, or sunbathing at the beach (which is right across the neighboring Hotel) at no extra charge.  Public transportation is within walking distance, and the access to downtown is a breeze. I could not ask for a better place to stay. I'm  planning to visit soon, this time with my grandchildren", 'time': 1580802705}, {'author_name': 'Randy Moar', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100735145654607555710/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gg6NHcY6Ykp2Pbx3OjmBSXF7MNokemGWu1LggvbMQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Accommodation was okay and buffet was mediocre. Owned by a Canadian gal from Winnipeg. Great atmosphere, food, and drink.", 'time': 1574691710}]

I've gone to them for a little over 3 years now and they've helped me with everything from vaccinations and food delivery to emergencies. They're available and helpful - I'm so glad that I met them when I did. I'm happy that my pups are in good hands.  ", 'time': 1579747585}, {'author_name': 'Rena Meier', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118344185131512421401/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-sog0lZg_nqo/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucl3O0QMEAchVwJy_VZvaNRn3Z6c7w/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Terrible. We tried to kennel our dogs here but the vet was very rude and didn‚Äôt know how to read our vaccination paperwork from the states. He claimed they were vaccinated before they were even born. user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Andrew Morgan', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113608538765397369758/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-lfviY7tKOy8/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckudICPuRFl77o6D94ko8D3u_9mIg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "Fabuloso. That's the name of the cleaner you can smell all over Mexico. They even use it on the street! They certainly use it at Costa Club as well, the smell is hard to get away from. 

Unfortunately it doesn't apply to much else at the hotel. My friend and I were staying in one of their two bedroom suites. As a three star hotel I didn't expect much and the rooms were pretty much that, but the pictures had shown a small kitchen with microwave and fridge, and it didn't have anything in the kitchen at all. I would have expected at least a coffee maker. We spoke to management about it and they said that because it had gone all inclusive, the kitchens were all removed.

The staff, on the other hand, were all very pleasant. After a couple of days, we had a waiter greet us as we came down to breakfast with our coffee and juice on the table. The cleaning staff were also very nice, most days our room had been cleaned by the time we got back from breakfast. Other than an over-enthusiasm for the above mentioned cleaner, they were great.

The food left a lot to be desired. We were there over Christmas and New Years, and the meals for those night were quite good, but other days were sub-par. It's the food that mostly contributes to the 2 star review. We had heard the hotel caters more to Mexicans than tourists from other countries, so we expected medium quality Mexican food, but in general it was barely edible. While out around the city we had meals at inexpensive fast-food type restaurants that were vastly superior. 

There is one speciality restaurant which served Italian food that was quite good, but I think I might have known more about Italian cuisine than the staff there. We had quite a few meals there and pretty much ran the menu as it was not extensive.

The mixed drinks were all using artificial sweetener (or perhaps stevia) which left a strange after taste in everything. I suspect this may be due to a sugar tax that has been added to Mexican soft drinks.  The beers available were okay, we mostly stuck with the darker one, Indio. The wines were barely drinkable (don't get me wrong, we drank a lot of it!) but this is not uncommon in Mexico.

As for location, it was a half hour walk from the Malec√≥n, hard to beat for convenience. While the buses were a bit uncomfortable if you got one of the older ones, they would get you around very cheaply. Even getting an Uber back to the hotel was usually very low cost.

Over all, not recommended, but hard to beat the price for a two bedroom suite.", 'time': 1556573199}, {'author_name': 'Margaret Mccrimmon', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110197024601745156666/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-x_OJifz7_uE/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucngon3Zhzg6ewe-kddonK568JhDDA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'This is a great resort. The staff is amazing and the whole resort is clean and well taken care of. Good food and a great place for children', 'time': 1518445771}, {'author_name': 'Negro Bal', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113178994584167283828/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-5p7bkFnxYyg/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuck_geWxUSVHTUb0U4LeAAkARTlj2g/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Ok', 'time': 1558496813}, {'author_name': 'Valeria Orozco', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101056481687213906007/reviews', 'language': 'es', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-6bhB8kMly7g/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucl0gBPBcUy6fKwVymRX_2gjT9DMnA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Las instalaciones est√°n bien y muy limpias el personal es muy atento la comida no es la mejor pero es variada. Las bebidas a base de jarabes y sin marcas conocidas y la playa es muy rocosa', 'time': 1595035702}, {'author_name': 'benjamin mendez lopez', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112500748459174801909/reviews', 'language': 'es', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhLPgi7ODr8mkoVqHe_WCsztfvK1yTkQokTHfdu=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 weeks ago', 'text': 'A m√≠ parecer: todo el hotel y las √°reas verdes,muy limpias. Todo √©l personal muy amables. Claro que regresar√© el pr√≥ximo a√±o.', 'time': 1598035752}]
