[{'author_name': 'Toni P', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100089440549299065450/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-ytwyA5MYZ9c/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckanqKaZ926TISLLXGP877jExADKA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': 'in the last week', 'text': 'It is very disorganized üòï, when we arrived we were taken to the wrong side, I think trying to sell some time shares, we declined the pitch so that was fine. Then we were told kids club was open by 4 people, when we to the building the sign on the door said they were swimming, great  so we walked through all the pools in the hot sun. Then we were told no they are open so walked back. Then we were told oh the caregiver had left so maybe they will be open tomorrow. I have very low expectations on it being open or anyone knowing what‚Äôs going down. The service was fine not extraordinary but average. The rooms are average a little dated and no balconies. The Westin andMarriott are much more beautiful and efficient. It‚Äôs tired and dated and just kinda blah. The shower rain head didn‚Äôt work so you only got a jet to the face. On a plus lovely water view from windows and clean.', 'time': 1598996199}, {'author_name': 'sergio jacobo', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103595425426189790212/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgSLkZr6Z7wN49Eo2AEldUMOgWXJ3yjsrxIEMeu=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Well I didn't buy this time share a friend did. I was invited and it was a great place to stay very clean. What I didn't like was their so called "Covid-19 event" a meeting so call to prevent the virus from spreading and everyone feeling safer while staying here . When we got there they showed us their other rooms which they tried to sell us. Like we just purchased last year why try to sell right away. So just a reminder once they take your money they want more.', 'time': 1596294019}, {'author_name': 'Michael C Goss', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101759029044925768351/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiNNQdXTYd_bgReYSSJdZQTMA2CG5OorNhIGTSXO90=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': "Very nice resort. Main hotel is closed and only one restaurant is open because of covid. The pool is a little warmer than I'd like it. Well my stay had a number of issues. The A/C in the room wasn't working. After 3 hours of the front desk telling me that it would be fixed soon and then telling me it was fixed. I finally convinced them to move me at 11pm at night. The first room only had pull out beds from the couches. The second room had bad a/c as well. The third room had working a/c so I took it. All of the hall lights on the floor were out and were not fixed in the 3 days that I was there. I asked to speak to the manager of the hotel and was told he was off-site. I asked for his email address and was told that someone would get back to me. No one ever did. The hotel was uninterested in my concerns. Beware of this hotel. If things work you're good if not too bad for you. The restaurant staff and grounds staff are excellent. Food in the hotel was good but not great.", 'time': 1593136224}, {'author_name': 'Thaly Hudson', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100636493240698561530/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiC7PhvjzOR_EuHEWQ4nXtfkcfOrzRjosXdx7IiVw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Amazing experience, the food is delicious and the staff is kind
Waiters are working with masks and gloves and they sanitize constantly, everything is very clean
Recommended 100%', 'time': 1594782706}, {'author_name': 'Ms.Miki Melrose', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113874068453659525139/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gi-HnYG8Xu_KKlNuUKtja6_DxicgJ7U-Qmk_QWQxQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': 'a week ago', 'text': 'I stayed at this all inclusive hotel for 3 days and 2 nights with pets. My experience was not very pleasant. 

Hotel porters were very friendly who helped us with our luggage who spoke english. Very patient and helpful.

Front desk, was not very friendly and check in was not easy. A bit time consuming and unwanted for after driving 5 hours. Had fill out documents for each room and for each pet. There is an additional cost for pets which costs $400 pesos plus tax and a deposit of $3,000 pesos as a guarantee per pet. They also hand you 2 page rules for pets which you would have to sign.

The concierge who we had was very informative and very kind with any information we needed. He was excellent, thank you!

The hotel does not offer free wifi for people who are staying unless you are down stairs in the lounge, pool, or in the restaurant. It costs $5 USD per day if you wish to have internet in your room. They will offer you a ‚ÄúVIP‚Äù access with free wifi and discounts if you join them for breakfast to listen about their time sharing offer which takes about 90min. But you would have to make a deposit of $200 pesos.

The pool is average for adults and children. But a plus for very young children since they have a special section with a depth of 1 ft (about 30cm).

If you are traveling with pets, you are very limited to do anything. The first day, we sat by the pool with our dogs and we had no problem with them. The second day, they told my mother who is over 75 year old to get off the property for having the dogs with her while she was watching her grandchildren in the pool which was unnecessary since it supposedly a family and pet friendly hotel. The pets are also not allowed in the common areas like the lounge or restaurants. They basically want your pets to stay in your room quietly because any complaints about dogs barking will also cause problems.

There is 3 different restaurants which you can enjoy dinning in. On Friday we enjoyed Italian for dinner in LA VILLITA. On Saturday, we made a reservation for GAVIOTA, Mexican food. In Gaviota, you can have anything on the menu in all inclusive except 3 dishes but they offer you a 40% discount if you wish to order them. There is an additional fee for room service of $50 pesos per each dish you order. During the afternoon you can consume by the pool side.

The tienda at the hotel has allot to offer when you need anything and a bit over priced but if wish to buy snacks or anything there is an oxxo around the corner to the right, out side the hotel.

If you want to enjoy time in their spa, I would recommend doing so when you first get to the hotel.

I personally don‚Äôt recommend this hotel for those who have children or pets. There is nothing for children to do but swimming in the pool or to walk on the beach. As for the pets, they would just end up staying in the room most of the time. The price I paid for this hotel, I could of left my dogs home and taken my children to a better hotel for enjoyment.', 'time': 1598371452}]

front desk telling me that it would be fixed soon and then telling me it was fixed  i finally convinced them to move me at at night  the first room only had pull out beds from the couches  the second room had bad a c as well  the third room had working a c so i took it  all of the hall lights on the floor were out and were not fixed in the days that i was there  i asked to speak to the manager of the hotel and was told he was off site  i asked for his email address and was told that someone would get back to me  no one ever did  the hotel was uninterested in my concerns  beware of this hotel  if things work you re good if not too bad for you  the restaurant staff and grounds staff are excellent  food in the hotel was good but not great   amazing experience  the food is delicious and the staff is kind nwaiters are working with masks and gloves and they sanitize constantly  everything is very clean nrecommended   i stayed at this all inclusive hotel for days and nights with pets  my experience was not very pleasant n nhotel porters were very friendly who helped us with our luggage who spoke english  very patient and helpful  n nfront desk  was not very friendly and check in was not easy  a bit time consuming and unwanted for after driving hours  had fill out documents for each room and for each pet  there is an additional cost for pets which costs  pesos plus tax and a deposit of  pesos as a guarantee per pet  they also hand you page rules for pets which you would have to sign  n nthe concierge who we had was very informative and very kind with any information we needed  he was excellent  thank you  n nthe hotel does not offer free wifi for people who are staying unless you are down stairs in the lounge  pool  or in the restaurant  it costs  usd per day if you wish to have internet in your room  they will offer you a ‚Äúvip‚Äù access with free wifi and discounts if you join them for breakfast to listen about their time sharing offer which takes about  but you would have to make a deposit of  pesos  n nthe pool is average for adults and children  but a plus for very young children since they have a special section with a depth of ft  about   n nif you are traveling with pets  you are very limited to do anything  the first day  we sat by the pool with our dogs and we had no problem with them  the second day  they told my mother who is over year old to get off the property for having the dogs with her while she was watching her grandchildren in the pool which was unnecessary since it supposedly a family and pet friendly hotel  the pets are also not allowed in the common areas like the lounge or restaurants  they basically want your pets to stay in your room quietly because any complaints about dogs barking will also cause problems  n nthere is different restaurants which you can enjoy dinning in  on friday we enjoyed italian for dinner in la villita  on saturday  we made a reservation for gaviota  mexican food  in gaviota  you can have anything on the menu in all inclusive except dishes but they offer you a  discount if you wish to order them  there is an additional fee for room service of  pesos per each dish you order  during the afternoon you can consume by the pool side  n nthe tienda at the hotel has allot to offer when you need anything and a bit over priced but if wish to buy snacks or anything there is an oxxo around the corner to the right  out side the hotel  n nif you want to enjoy time in their spa  i would recommend doing so when you first get to the hotel  n ni personally don‚Äôt recommend this hotel for those who have children or pets  there is nothing for children to do but swimming in the pool or to walk on the beach  as for the pets  they would just end up staying in the room most of the time  the price i paid for this hotel  i could of left my dogs home and taken my children to a better hotel for enjoyment

user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': '801 Mom', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110103181691652557765/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiF8oZ35ZdHqHPreUCVuRIxCj8r9zZB9Nv52Za7Gg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': "We have been owners for over 20 years and every time we visit our experience is different. Sometimes good sometimes bad. I wish it could be more consistent. Once good thing they recently have done is updated the lobby and added a bar/grill out front that is very modern and clean looking. They also added a nice spa with pretty good prices with the discount they offer from the staff working the pool to advertise. 

Pros: My kids like the pottery painting station. Nice break from pool time. New clean spa. Pool waiters are great. Happy hour 2 for 1 drinks is the best by the pool. Not far from town (the Malecon) Close to grocery and Walmart for shopping. Rooms are good size. All rooms face the ocean. Fireworks a few nights a week are fun to watch.

Cons: The maintenance fees over the years have increased 300% which is why we can't wait to be done with this place.  Beach is rocky (go somewhere else) Food is ok. Buffet is expensive and terrible for vegetarian choices. (But they did offer a few Gluten Free choices.) Rooms haven't been updated in 20 years (but there is construction always going on so slowly they are updating). Kids club is lame and geared to toddlers. Pool was slimy and I questioned how often they do a deep clean!!!! Hot tub was green in the grout and gross. Needs a good cleaning.", 'time': 1578681034}, {'author_name': 'Michelle Mozell', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110262670587361715866/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgfY6JXlye1MEcemP8BX_4XET5CREMvzAWbLORi=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'The resort is friendly, clean and easily accessible to the malycon and downtown PV. price_level_x: Calle Lirios 837, Puerto Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Terri Stangl', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116381182144433331856/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gia6W4ZBmMuEhQzd7Kls_Xp24Z97UpxQeOeoRVgQw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'I have stayed at Artes several times - both as an individual and couple - and  I highly recommend it as a first rate and relaxing place to  visit.  The location is quiet and has a view over the bay that is one of the best in the area. Sunsets are breathtaking!   The facilities and grounds are gorgeous,  with large rooms,  private bathrooms,   an infinity pool,  float tanks,  and other spa services.  The meals and snacks are delicious and all prepared onsite, including homemade baked goods.  You dine with the hosts,  John and Sandy,  who are interesting and knowledgeable and fun to talk with. On occasion there have even been live musicians who came by!   This is a great and relaxing place for a retreat or meeting for a small business team or family.', 'time': 1593471162}, {'author_name': 'Joseph Swindell', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115361139524221983738/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgBfQrfG6zCUJ_v-LCKoe-kag0l25Y3ACdHt3FDgQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '3 months ago', 'text': 'I was in town on a work trip and had an absolutely fantastic experience at Artes.  John and Sandy were extremely accommodating and gracious hosts.  The weekend was such an authentic experience and felt like a much more immersive experience than you can receive at a standard beach resort.  Meals and accommodations were incredible and the view of the bay from Artes cannot be beat.  it was very enjoyable to be able to sit down and share meals with the hosts and their assistants with family style dining and they are truly unique, interesting and enjoyable company.  The spa services on site were amazing and relaxing and I left the B&B refreshed and with excellent memories.  Worth the trip of the beachfront and onto the hills for an experience that cannot be beat.', 'time': 1590361815}]

price_level_x: Calle Ju√°rez 793, Centro, Puerto Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Alex Tea', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101295503531096579540/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-3QS3_fn2Jyw/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAm6k/AMZuuckPSxkvRKlqr6VncbBH_h0PPQhWDA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '8 months ago', 'text': 'Currently staying here and it's a disaster.
The good reviews are completely misleading. This place is so filthy and disorganized. 

Check In Issues 
Cost of private room in hostel is $100 (1900 pesos) per night 
Despite room cost, they only accepted cash and didn't accept credit cards
Only 1 staff member spoke English, and they were off duty. When they came to help, they didn't know what they were doing, made lots of mistakes, and took a while to actually check me in. Their staff barely understands English. 
After finding an ATM and bringing back cash, they didn't have change for me.
When they finally found change, they didn't understand how to do the math and took a while to figure it out. 
Deposit was required for a towel, but I didn't receive a towel when I checked in.
Given 4 keys, none of which were labeled. 

The staff seemed pretty ashamed about all of the above, so I didn't have to say much for them to understand that the situation was not acceptable. 

Then when they took me to the room, I found a whole new set of problems. 

Room Issues 
Sheets were torn when I arrived. 
Door to the roof is missing, exposing outside noise, light, and heat/cold. 
No AC or heat in the room. 
Room is directly next to the hostel roof bar, which plays loud music and has people talking and coming and going until midnight. 
Fridge was being used by the bar staff as a beer fridge. I had to wait while they emptied it AFTER I arrived so I could use it. 
Shower has only two settings: Hottest and coldest, and can't really be adjusted to a comfortable temperature. I was using it and it tripped the circuit breaker. 
At night, it was very cold but there was no blanket in the room, just two thin sheets. When I asked at the front desk for a blanket, they said the blankets weren't ready. So I had to sleep without one.

Also, the room and hostel in general are filthy. I took a shower and within an hour my feet were dirty. (See pictures) 

This place offers "breakfast" but actually they just set out the ingredients and everyone has to cook for themselves. But all the cooking equipment is melted, which is a serious health hazard. 

I spoke with the manager and he didn't really care about any of this. He wouldn't help and he said he didn't mind if people knew how this place really was.', 'time': 1577678601}, {'author_name': 'Jalaj Khanna', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104993550374754960506/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-ANYXNF-BCCk/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckM51ZW6NjuMeHXH9A7kl7wwsN6JQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4/photo.jpg', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'The location of the hostel is perfect. They have free make your own breakfast. The owner has a very cute dog which is a big plus.

Location is near to the 3 big clubs in Puerto Vallarta and in centro which is great. There is a 24 hours oxxo right beside the hostel. 

The hostel is a bit dirty, I stayed in the 4 bed dorm and there were spider webs on the ceiling. The sheets and towels could be cleaner.
Although the bathroom was always clean.

Coming to the washroom, there is just one shower, one wash basin and 2 toilets for all the men, so you will have to wait specially in the morning. 

With regards to the common area, during my stay it was mostly the people who were working in the hostel were hanging out (volunteers).
So it was a bit tough to meet others. They had a nice rooftop bar which was almost always empty though. 

You can consider this hostel if other hostels are not available, but should not be your first choice.', 'time': 1578773850}, {'author_name': 'Guillaume Dionisi', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110111646131922352935/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-yKVcLM2Nn6g/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckzYdu-XQG6iPXXC5LoI_MrgstLHg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Amazing hostel with helpful and friendly staff. Ideally located in Puerto Vallarta, close to the beach, the shops and the party places. Great rooftop bar with plenty of options and good vibes!

Thought I would stay 1 night, ended up staying a month! Would recommend 100% :)', 'time': 1561318650}, {'author_name': 'Paul McBride', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107483420638330820594/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-r2ny0Tcdf_g/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckMNjsuhiIuSAkc2A0VV7L9qNqMoQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "A great hostel with a great host. Eric is very friendly, generous, flexible and inclusive while allowing guests be space they might desire. 
I personally enjoyed my stay and stayed a couple of days longer than intended. The hostel is easy walking distance to many good places.
Many hostels have ridiculously expensive laundry services but Eric's pricing is spot on.
Thanks for the stay!", 'time': 1560548988}, {'author_name': 'bu', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117081237960876369698/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjQFbS_9RLweX3a6JPcI-4olVH_i2VSV2UvzP-KqA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "First time at a hostel and I loved the experience. The staff were really friendly and nice.
Pros: 
-The bar and alcohol were cheap. They have a beer pong table. 
-Close to the Mandala club (about 5 mins walk). 
-Nice view in the morning
-Near the The Church of Parish of Our Lady of Guadalupe (about 15 mins walk)
-Near El Campanario restaurant (I recommend the potatoes tacos with beef and their hot sauce (which you get 4 tacos for 65 pesos) and I ordered Modelo (30 pesos))
-Next to the beach, bazaars, dep, pharmacy, tattoo shop, coffee shop and McDonald's. 

Cons:
-The wifi connection is bad: the sweet spot is in their kitchen aka lounge. --The front door is small and heavy. 
-Need a better ventilation in the unisex room !!!!! biggest cons.
-Only one shower available and two bathroom in the lady's bathroom.
-The noise but it didn't bother me, I actually liked it.

They also offer:
-Breakfast (eggs, white bread, peanut butter, jam, milk, coffee) If you want fruits or vegetable there's an Oxxo (dep) in front of the hostel.
-Towels, lockers or extra key entrance but they require a deposit of 100 or 50 pesos (I don't remember.) 
 
The also have a Netflix room. One thing I'd have to point out is their curtain is not dark enough.", 'time': 1553302862}]

user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Nathaniel Jameer', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100128566221766013388/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.ggpht.com/-AXFo6p3HAkg/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/f5e0ayuzYio/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "Sorry that Casa 8 had a horrible experience with Joe Sanchez. We purchased with Joe and we're extremely happy with our unit. The entire team has been very accommodating to our needs and fixed any issues we had. We now have friends and family looking to invest in the new phase.", 'time': 1552922411}, {'author_name': 'Mike Boustead', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117642933616653036621/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.ggpht.com/-iIC6t4OjHpI/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/VsMkHA2Foz4/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'HORRIFIC EXPERIENCE with Joe Sanchez, builder/developer of The Summit Eco Townhomes and sky terrace.  We were under contract to buy Casa 8 at The Summit.  We paid 80% of the entire purchase price of $276,400 to Joe Sanchez.  We took possession and lived there for 6 weeks, Oct 30-Dec 7, 2017.  On Dec 7, Mr. Sanchez shut off our electricity and water.  That evening while we were out, he  locked us out of our home and did not allow us to ever return ever.\xa0 Our dogs were inside our condo without the ability to eat, urinate nor defecate for almost 20 hours.\xa0 David and I were without our medications including those we are required to take daily.  In addition, without our knowledge or permission, Mr. Sanchez, removed all of our possessions valuing $100,000+ to somewhere we don‚Äôt know.  He also attempted to take our grand piano.  16 months later, he still has ALL the money we paid plus our ALL our possessions. We lost everything.  Legal proceedings are on going. Be very cautious dealing with Joe Sanchez and The Summit.', 'time': 1552843301}, {'author_name': 'Lorne Ludwig', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106777290863581855210/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.ggpht.com/-E5dZKNWkAbc/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/1IHFJOZd17A/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'The Summit is a great place!  The design is an amazing use of the land and the views are incredible.  The interiors layouts are all unique and make the best use of every space.  Joe has so much passion for his work and you see it in what he builds.  I will live at summit someday (hopefully soon).', 'time': 1564098450}, {'author_name': 'C. Alqadhi', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109118698799030229747/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.ggpht.com/-Yqb9eKe_lYw/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/ahvJMQxYbwc/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'We took a mini vacation and landed at this amazing jewel  It was wonderful and had everything we were looking for. Com is giving away FREE Stays!!!', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109770576352590226448/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-Qjh4NArAftk/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmypLqwHHw7mmAMpe9Q-0WUg64cCQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a week ago', 'text': 'Spent more money to eat at Caf√© Des Artistes and the food and experience (especially the live music) at Hacienda San Angel far surpassed that experience for less money. Cannot rave enough about this experience and the service... next level! Highly recommend the tuna tartare if available.. Will be back without a shadow of a doubt !!', 'time': 1598300625}, {'author_name': 'Jillian Goralski', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113231975751757743018/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-Mn97Yn49plw/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnH3PW2zBgo6qWRh8rkiLqcWvFvcA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 weeks ago', 'text': 'Hacienda San Angel is a hotel that I have been wanting to stay FOREVER! I finally got my wish last weekend to celebrate our 20 yr. anniversary. This is one of the most beautiful hotels I have ever stayed in. The authentic hacienda finishings, the gardens, the pools, the rooms were all what I imagined, but better! The staff was amazing, attentive and sweet. The views we had from our room of the city, the mountains and the ocean, I am sure are some of the best in the city! We only ate the breakfast during our stay as the main restaurant was closed - but it was delicious and fresh. Also the best margarita I have every had (not for breakfast). If you are looking for a special, all round amazing experience, this is the place to be. Thank you HSA, cannot wait to return again very soon!', 'time': 1597955112}, {'author_name': 'Julia Otter', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104309971546909995456/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhFP9T53DrJWm3G3agJDLZIhCq0psx816us5hXJ8h8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'in the last week', 'text': "My husband and I celebrated our honeymoon at Hacienda San Angel. We happened to be the only guests staying at the hotel and enjoyed a very relaxing 3 nights at the property. There are 3 pools and lots of little areas to hang out during the day. We stayed in the presidential suite and spent most of our time on our balcony soaking up the sun, drinking wine and watching the sunsets at night. The staff was extremely accommodating and friendly throughout our stay. The onsite restaurant was closed for dinner due to Covid-19 restrictions, but we enjoyed exploring restaurants in Puerto Vallarta. We got breakfast every morning in our room, and the hotel set up an in-room massage for us. I definitely recommend this hotel if you're in Puerto Vallarta!", 'time': 1598894150}, {'author_name': 'chris chapin', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103982446366220446802/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-yPtpw7cSp_A/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucn6WWu2Hj_1barK-flhBjojO8vXXA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '4 months ago', 'text': 'If you are looking for a spectacular view with an excellent meal this is the place. Mariachis the night there were the best we have heard in Mexico and we have been visiting for years.', 'time': 1586500456}]

We went with 3 other families and it was a perfect location for the everyone to have fun in the pool and easy enough to get down to the boardwalk even with little ones. The property manager Saskia was great and helped us with some information about local needs. The place was cleaned every other day and the pool and garden guy also came every other day, so everything felt as fresh as when we started. Our vacation was truly that - a vacation we could all relax and have fun. user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Jonathon Davey', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113974786059667476695/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiIJBuADc14oszPucueGWs4iaquQqPmMN0JanPbvw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'EQUISITE TIME HERE@ KRAKEN! :D\n\nArrived to a cosy & hip travel hub, full of ace wanderers with more than a story to tell ;)  Chill vibes, cool beer and a rooftop terrace with views and breeze!, what more can u want??! :D', 'time': 1593745580}, {'author_name': 'Jody Cross', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116564611306675747839/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhhOP8o98iiafDV8v4Zoxfbfwe2Vd4rovk_3bRm=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'THE hostel to stay at in Puerto Vallarta!  Just a couple blocks from the ocean, breathtaking views, very affordable, near lots of easy transportation (esp to and from airport!), near stores/food/bars/etc., awesome murals painted all over the building, and very clean!  The staff is extremely fun and friendly, and sometimes they even take groups on guided hikes. user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Jackson Loos', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115695232664326752707/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjOuCbqexIfq5ilF2Q46Hu2vyWqtEXmVL6cRyzGvA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Superior service in a stunning retreat. We will return to Casa Tabachin.', 'time': 1581525867}, {'author_name': 'd hogan', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108322421837194650129/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gh8R8-72pCxHT4Y7riCFrYslOMyruQOZk6J2nZadw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'What an amazing experience. Big shout out to the staff: Lala, Ana, Juana, and Luis! I can not believe how much effort you all put into making my stay so memorable. Thanks. Gracias. Casa Tabachin is conveniently located within walking distance or short ride to the best eateries, bars, nightclubs, shops, and excursions. There area so many rooms and even the "casita" is incredible. So gather up a bunch of friends, and have everyone pitch in for a vacation with hotel service and all the comforts of a private home.', 'time': 1580682070}, {'author_name': 'alexandr demchuk', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109093736634878215533/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Ght4IPk2oJ6V10uo5UINc8gjgoprz7Tu-IpBcdv=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '8 months ago', 'text': "Stayed at Casa Tabachin with friends. Had absolutely amazing time, the level of comfort and luxury is unparalleled and easily beats any high end resort! Villa has a dedicated staff that added a personal touch and made us feel like home. 

Just imagine coming back from a walk throughout the city, tired and sweaty and have a fresh guacamole and margaritas waiting for us at the moment's notice. 

The rooms were amazing too, and the sunset views from the terrace will make your Instagram friends jealous. Located in the old town it's close to the nightlife but at the same time its quiet and tranquil, perfect to destress, recharge, and get ready for new adventures.

I will be back for sure!!!", 'time': 1576082055}, {'author_name': 'Yvonne Ackerman', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101930368964489525540/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiC4Zq4n1OAcCUXnp5HZ5HlVbPKHCoh1t9-c0_A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '9 months ago', 'text': "Casa Tabachin is a dream. The house itself is beautiful, clean, and filled with awesome art, but it's the full-time staff that puts this property in a class of its own. Chef Luis and House Manager Lala and the rest of the staff go above and beyond to make sure you're well-fed and comfortable. Casa Tabachin is also in a perfect location to access the shops, beach, and nightlife that Puerto Vallarta has to offer. There is a double locked door and a full-time Night Watchman as well, so we felt perfectly safe. We cannot recommend this house enough, and we can't wait to go back soon.", 'time': 1575406958}, {'author_name': 'Jason Ackerman', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101599211281090699807/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgOZOc8HADiSwGm8-CyLcDNz16A6PLAQ5gFCifCmA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '9 months ago', 'text': "We visited Casa Tabachin last week. This was our first visit to Puerto Vallarta, so we weren't sure what to expect. being from the East Coast we are used to vacationing in the Caribbean. Casa Tabachin knocks the socks off any house we've stayed anywhere else. There are 360 degree views of Puerto Vallarta and the Pacific Ocean. The house comes with a full time Chef and housekeepers, as well as a night watchman. From the moment you walk in the front door you are treated like royalty. The staff were exceptional, the Chef Luis wowed us with his fabulous cooking. 

The house also comes with a concierge, which can organize day trips, tours, tequila tastings, etc. We did a half day zip-lining excersion that was top notch. We also did a mezcal tasting with Vallarta Tequila Tasting, who were amazing. I would highly recommend both tours. Need a more relaxing day? You can also organize masseuses to come to the house. 

Puerto Vallarta and Casa Tabachin were incredible, and we will be going back in the near future.", 'time': 1574908667}]

It is this reason we didn't rate this place with 5 stars: many other places request guests not smoke or smoke only on their own private terraces.  \nThey have dogs and one cat, all well behaved. user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Ali Kavusi', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103265149149420958500/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgOURdBTm-Wvt8UHHsNoRUNSB1yyPpuEnEfqh8Z=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'By far the only place to stay and enjoy Puerto Vallarta.
The best Staff on the Planet.
Stay close to the pier so you can disembark Sportfishing. 
I pick this place over any all inclusive resort.
Who wants to stay prisoner of a resort.
When you can stay in the Heart of the Romantic Zone. 
Make friends relax unwind/recharge.
Feel good on a hands on or hands off vacay.
Your choice service and sustainability.', 'time': 1593229644}, {'author_name': 'Ei Ny', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110650753038677585301/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-qYXD3bjJO_Y/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclsFTmNYIxouraVPQYO8GDd1d0VHA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Simple but nice interior rooms, my room has a very nice view', 'time': 1596076699}, {'author_name': 'Cole Humeny', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115327277311972057945/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhgskqgEvJcn_0XKVGLFHLvWkz19KwP1xkZMPZygR8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': "The rooms not facing the water are pretty small.  There is a sharp sewer smell every morning or whenever water hasn't been put down a drain.  

I booked a room with a one double bed 3.5 months in advance only to show up and be given a room with two single beds.  They couldn't explain why I couldn't get the room I booked, but they did get me a room with one double bed as soon as one opened.

Great location and good service.  I wouldn't book here again as the rooms were quite pricey for what you get.", 'time': 1585169622}, {'author_name': "John O'Brien", 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104046584573831722573/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-47t7VbZabNc/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnmi2zMRjD7IzcG4Tnr5NtBe05A0A/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4/photo.jpg', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Comfy bed, road side lower room was a little noise early moring with truck delivery.', 'time': 1581369658}, {'author_name': 'Xavier Basulto', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102202696822758053458/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-KWXZVcVkAIY/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnqqRv4mgyjiX8BmmYoyinkJ3UPVQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'Great location,  great friendly professional smiling staff, beautiful beach, super convenient to everything.  A definite repeat!', 'time': 1581183915}]

price_level_x: Calle Rodolfo G√≥mez 111, Emiliano Zapata, Puerto Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Joe Bernstein', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103005070990895372024/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjXy-yfATxRc0Jbp3ulx_hJk8e0n0cBykb86GhNGQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '3 months ago', 'text': 'This hotel is undergoing renovations and there's a huge difference between the new rooms you see in the pictures and the old room you'll be placed in. I booked my room through VRBO, which left me with less recourse for changing my room after I checked in, but I was appalled by the quality. One of the two power outlets in the room was hanging by its wires from a large hole in the wall. The "king size" bed was two wooden twin frames pushed together with a larger mattress and single sheet on top. I could feel the wood frame in the middle of the bed. There was no headboard and minimal bedding. The room faced a busy side street and the window curtain let nearly all of the outside light in even in the middle of the night. 

I had to beg for a new room after my first night and was eventually moved into a new room that was slightly nicer, but this one had a clogged shower drain and visible mold on the walls. The staff was sympathetic, but not friendly or helpful in resolving room complaints. When I complained, I was on a list of at least 6 other guests who were dissatisfied with their rooms.

This hotel is in a great location, but for the prices they charge, you can get a much nicer room anywhere else in the neighborhood. Don't take your chances on what kind of room they'll give you.', 'time': 1591559406}, {'author_name': 'Sales Mann', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101802892858634973441/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-mN6KOq-_CyI/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmt4HwpIl_xGhBd6GCL00r_Tw2V8Q/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'We just spent 10 days at the San Marino resort. There were 9 people of various ages/demographics in our group. 
This location could not be better if you want to be in the heart of the Romantic Zone.
Things go down hill fast from there.
The resort itself is partially renovated. All of our 5 rooms were terrible. Two of our rooms had decent beds. The rest were very uncomfortable. All of our rooms had old worn out decor. Worn out bathrooms mirrors, cracked & moldy shower tiles. Curtains hanging off broken pulls. The rooms were smelly (damp) and poorly lit.  There was a serious lack of basic towel/water bottle service. If you want a good room opt for the ocean side suite rooms 1-4 on all floors. These rooms have been renovated. We toured them when we repeatedly tried to change rooms. They wanted $60 US extra for these rooms.
The all inclusive food was ok but quickly become unappealing. Breakfast was the best meal of the day. Bar service starts from 11am -10 pm. Last call was at 9:45 pm (seriously!) 
There are no activities at the resort. The location is great.  Best not to go all inclusive and leave the site to drink/eat. 
Hats off to the service and cleaning staff. They were hard working and very nice. The front desk was another story. They would not accommodate a room change unless maybe you opened your wallet. Every day you would hear new arriving guests complaining about there rooms and asking to be moved. EVERY DAY !
They have a great lounging section just off the beach to sit and the pools were adequate.
I would not stay here again unless I got a great deal on one of the ocean view suites. I would not recommend the food or all inclusive deal. 
There are way better deals to be had in this area. 
I hope the owners continue to improve the resort and do so quickly.', 'time': 1583002696}, {'author_name': 'Susan G', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104860086156917911203/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgQIzpYpeRrH0s-uMZ7-HygO5rk0S6KNIx1dxiwYjs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'Pictures are not showing how the hotel rooms are. Unfortunately we had to leave. Not happy with the room they gave us! But the location is great...just by the pier', 'time': 1584941305}, {'author_name': 'J Levesque', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111480579011468248333/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-cD4SvoLDMjs/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckUm_TWbMa-qMfijJtq8gAAw0tAZQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Staff very friendly and accommodating. Room above lobby, facing street,  basic, no hand towels, no bath mat, noise from the street kept us awake all night, curtains did not blackout the street lights at night.', 'time': 1582637182}, {'author_name': 'japca', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112183326581173341201/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Giy9lqa7Yt9N2Ik0I0g-Lj2tIw7_1Cz-8RXdqwEGg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': "Wow! The food was delicious & the dinning room was very nice, we visited a friend's room & it was fantastic. Great view of the pier!", 'time': 1583387658}]

user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Keith Kuromi', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115243466474589406261/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gjt0iQdG8-8WexLvBVAuNLvUjNUkAS87o4EU0hv5uc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'Fantastic location. Had to move room because the water drains smelt horrible like sewage horrible the staff said they fixed it so we stay in the room another night. I asked the bell boy with the goatee that closed the pool the night before about it and he acknowledged he grabbed it but did not bother to stop sweeping to get it for me, so I said ‚Äúill just get it later?‚Äù and he half smiled and nodded his head. I seen him multiple times for the next few days and he would just ignore or half smile and walk away. IMO Seems like the staff are not very happy at the hotel overall maybe the management should look after them better. The rooms are pretty clean overall and the location is fantastic. once all the construction is done it should be nicer, I would try it again after the renovations.', 'time': 1579707588}, {'author_name': 'Elaine Berkowitz', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114988612489994475445/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-baSBokiTIB8/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclbz5DQfB-S6-mhqGkQBQmzgPWz_g/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '4 months ago', 'text': 'Love it here.

user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'nagib etoll', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103255447021204292966/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gh1W9flIanJkfb7UWjO0z5mKoyvA7DM1RVuGTqDH44=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'It is a nice place with a friendly staff. The price is low and you get a better place than what you pay for. As it is in any place at this price point you hear road noise. The rooms are air conditioned, which is nice when you really need it. The beds are firm but better than most. The location is great! Easy access to the bus. Nice safe area with lots of great food and drink options. I have had a great stay.', 'time': 1579804673}, {'author_name': 'Federica GD', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108388200763525944384/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-XWxrYyMCsyE/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmj5LqNf19tnBaoRgcrgoDvGo60Gg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '10 months ago', 'text': 'One star is only for the good location. I am ok with no-frills hotels for a short stay but the rooms are absolutely not as advertised, my husband and I asked for a double bed and we‚Äôve been assigned to a twin with two tiny beds. On top of it the room was dirty and smelly. Both room and bathroom were so small you can‚Äôt move in there. The hotel pool is as small as a bath tub. I wish I knew what I was booking instead of looking at completely different pictures thinking it was a simple but much prettier and clean hotel.', 'time': 1572529139}, {'author_name': 'A. Dastan', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107089620278469204514/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-5nNfHC5bHBw/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckHcBithDcnXwdpNxEaVBWzWQD-gg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Service overall was okay. They have this policy (penalty for early checkout!) they did not mention on their website, during in-person reservation or at check-in. The management accepted to remove the penalty for early checkout after more than a week of waiting and back and forth communication. However, despite asking many times to pay in cash to avoid the exchange rate, they eventually charged the credit card on hold and when they returned the money (after I paid in cash) they credited the account instead of refunding and paid the exchange rate anyway to the credit card company.', 'time': 1582032189}, {'author_name': 'Dale Douglas', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103320653359385033428/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiZwEN9YEqoEZieEuS-i0ERmywl5naqaZfakoVX6pM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "Historic inn located atop a hill in the Gringo Gulch section if Centro. A wonderful place to stay if you don't have mobility issues and or dislike climbing numerous steps and inclines to get around.", 'time': 1563953535}, {'author_name': 'Chris W', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103087154458405780771/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgnQG2I5Fw9bFyyGRTYLaEF9xT4rFMHTfXvYJsgOA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '4 months ago', 'text': 'Decent hotel.  No complaints.', 'time': 1587164085}]

[{'author_name': 'Frederick Cook', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102116734961456923359/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjRRiOh53K3rXV-0AQc905Tb7b86ijzzTnNiZsWUw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': 'a week ago', 'text': 'I stayed in Feb of 2020. This place was immaculate. Very clean and very professional. I didn't have to lift a finger. 4 out of 5 because the hot tub wasn't ready for us on the balcony we had to wait 3 hours for it to warm up, and the maintenance man "told on us" that we had the door open along with the AC when he could have just asked up and said that's a policy, I thought that was strange. Service is terrible and you can't bring any guests over in the evening.", 'time': 1595604371}, {'author_name': 'Ei Ny', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110650753038677585301/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-qYXD3bjJO_Y/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclsFTmNYIxouraVPQYO8GDd1d0VHA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'The public areas and bars are beautiful. Was not in the rooms.', 'time': 1594775915}, {'author_name': 'August Thompkins', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102692510522399851472/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-JimXmsonnx8/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckl_BMPUZB5QaBOC25A526V7Psncg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Service was a disaster with COVID, seems as though they had not implemented very clear plans and management seemed confused and inadequate when things were escalated.', 'time': 1595151514}, {'author_name': 'Dimitry Roginsky', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115793561638902947955/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-C7SfKQ8YX60/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnOfaZr4B3xEk6mSzSwY8gUr4pkTQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2/photo.jpg', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'I had a reservation for Luxury Penthouse at Pinnacle 220 from July 24-27. I‚Äôm Orbitz Platinum/Expedia VIP and I‚Äôve contacted the hotel in advance to request a room with ocean view and a quiet room. The property, which was mostly empty due to COVID, which is listed as Orbitz/Expedia VIP, refused the upgrade and provided the worst room available overseeing a loud road with passing trucks with a hill view.

Front desk manager Brenda completely lacks customer service skills. She kept repeating ‚Äúyou are getting what you paid for ‚Äúwithout offering a resolution. 

I had a great experience the last time I stayed here in March 2019. However, following this check in experience, I will most likely never stay here again. I had to waste  over an hour at check in  with the manager raising her voice, telling a paying guest that she did not like my attitude and even rolling her eyes in my face( video recording available ). 

I ended up paying more for an upgrade, but this was the worst check in experience of my life. This management needs to change!', 'time': 1595689184}]

I stayed here through Airbnb with friends.', 'time': 1578413414}, {'author_name': 'Micheline Rouillard', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114804359820035838586/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiS7GHB1gjj4fBW68nhZQDORNVmfLJ-GQozFrFS=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': "I reached out to Villa Mercedes Petit Hotel to make a reservation for my friend‚Äôs 50th birthday. 
My reservation was from February 16 to February 21st. 
I had to cancel, because my flight got cancelled and then the flight tickets were  to expensive. 
My cancellation was within 24 hours as per their policy. 
Daniela offered me a certificate valid for a year for the amount of my booking to use at a later with the hotel, but my intention was to come and celebrate my friends 50th birthday. I have no traveling plans to come to Vallarta in a near future. 
I requested full reimbursement since I canceled within 24 hours as stated in their policy, and it was declined.  By the time I addressed the fact that they had a cancellation policy, they removed it from their website. 
Please be aware that this Hotel has very questionable business practices if you decide to make a reservation at their Hotel. I live in Canada, and don't have the luxury to go to Mexico that easy.", 'time': 1582752503}]

The Residences by Pinnacle is right next door, but if you're looking for value Amaca is where you go.  In addition to hotel rooms they offer suites where some have  kitchenettes, others have balconies with partial Seaview, others city view.  There is a bar (Vesper was on duty the day l was there) and plunge pool on the top floor offering beautiful views of Banderas Bay and the city coastline.  There is only one precaution and that is if you have mobility issues and walking can be difficult, this is not a good recommendation because of the number of steps from the street to the reception area and then again to the rooms or bar and pool.  Other than that, if you are not concerned with steps, you will save a great deal of money by staying here and have a million dollar location as well.  If you are a local, stop in and just to have a drink and enjoy the famous view at sunset.", 'time': 1583532560}]

rating_y: Hotel Andales on the Bay Suites
user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Tammy Mckean', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106361217721967982458/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gj_XTGbgPj3TtbUJQrjgLZfyHNo8LU_IpCF6xEa=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'This place is more than I would ever dream of it being! Beautiful,  elegant accommodating, clean, no pests, no intruders,  police everywhere,  safe, unimaginable food, & always bottled/filtered water,  fireworks, & party every night!  Hoping to come back here real soon.', 'time': 1582657162}, {'author_name': 'Javier Luna', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100672623548332405231/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-RpzeopoGcEw/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAjs/AMZuuclzhXso6mW3iLqVvMwTOzg0iMassA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2/photo.jpg', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': '9 months ago', 'text': 'The housekeeper was very nice, but the check in process is not straight forward and the rooms are very different than what is advertised. We ended up staying somewhere else after checking in.', 'time': 1575662829}, {'author_name': 'Todd Leek', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116037647052255557552/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgLF3GoFppdiSW8sehKdkOwUfDgHWHMyFhD1kSQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '8 months ago', 'text': 'VACATION RUINED. We have stayed at this property for four years. This year we rented PH 8 for three weeks. Usually we have enjoyed our stay. Suddenly, yesterday, we were told by Christian Sanchez the manager, that they needed to rewire the electrical. We had been experiencing some problems, during the week, but were willing to work with them. No, they said, you have to be out with all your stuff. First they sent us to a filthy place called Casa Andales. Then they sent us to the Holiday Inn out by the airport. Today we went back to find a Canadian family in the unit -- no electrical problems at all. Christian Sanchez and his boss Gary lied to us for two straight days. Our suspicion is that Gary orchestrated the whole thing to double-dip the room fare. We now have to fly home a week early, as it is one of the busiest weeks of the year -- no comparable units available. Bottom Line: Christian, Gary and the front desk staff are liars and con artists. AVOID THIS AND ALL ANDALES PROPERTIES AT ALL COSTS!', 'time': 1577731450}, {'author_name': 'Ann Smith', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117355461265458115512/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gi_Hiz9zktNR2ME6H9XVvpX2Knvra2MgbwkyfLluQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Secure, nice rooms, staff very efficient and kind. The location is great.i walked everywhere', 'time': 1564785209}, {'author_name': 'Caitlin Strom-martin', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104544053890677985100/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GijI5-1Zmx2vEvllE_O6ce5pxNzWdhqNYfuc7PGeg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': "This was my second time staying at Andales on the Bay. I love it. There are some amenities that could be improved (like, more basics for the kitchen for those who want to cook big meals), but it's not a big deal. The hosts are happy to provide for you, and the house keepers are so nice and helpful.The pool and upper patio is a wonderful way to relax and take in the views. It's safe, clean, and I'd recommend it.", 'time': 1516228504}]

price_level_x: L√°zaro C√°rdenas 205, Emiliano Zapata, Puerto Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Tripp Carter', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101383156219133685222/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-F-rS9Q67vuY/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnIaVf6i5iSr6bEwcNpgvcXxl3slg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '4 months ago', 'text': 'We purchased a condominium in PV in 2007.  Friends referred us to PVRPV to help us 1) management the property for us since we live in Houston, Texas in the USA, and 2) market and handle the vacation leasing of the unit for us.  Due to a change in personal circumstances, we were forced to sell the condominium in 2020.  We cannot speak highly enough of PVRPV on both fronts throughout the time we owned and leased this unit.  They were spectacular in every sense of the word!  Their teams are extremely professional and very easy to work with.
As far as the management of the unit goes, from the beginning, a member of their staff went with us to set up our bank account.  They opened all our utility accounts for us.  They provided weekly maid service as well as weekly management inspection of the unit.  When a hurricane was approaching, they removed all our balcony furniture and plants (no easy feat) and they replaced them.  When we were selling the condominium, their staff worked closely with our local realtor and went above and beyond to provide the Notary with all the documents we needed from local utilities in order to close during the COV-19 pandemic (again no easy feat).
When it comes to handling the rental of the unit, they did another spectacular job.  They handled all details from marketing to meeting the renters the day of check-in and out.  They provided an excellent accounting.  We very extremely pleased with the results.  Even when it was occupied by our friends (no rental commissions), their staff still met them on their arrival to help them get settled.  They always went above and beyond.
The truly deserve a five star rating in our opinion.
Well done, PVRPV.

Tripp Carter
Houston, Texas', 'time': 1586467865}, {'author_name': 'Kevin Roberts', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101407252232364820394/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjU4TsrY5AZ1c3FAOwIFtgN9B7tZVOa2laf-R2C=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Worst experience ever, no one to meet us at the property on arrival, dirty pool had to ask to be cleaned, building work banging on nedroom walls from 8am till 7pm. Have to walk through a building site to get to front door and when you contact Jonathon for help he avoids you as much as possible, 2 weeks later i am still awaiting an email appology as requested- AVOID THIS BUSINESS THEY ARE BAD VERY BAD', 'time': 1558784737}, {'author_name': 'Harvey Kaye', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105938508986221096807/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Giq299eJsgS-FfteLsy0ACzBde6mjZha4MSt5HS=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'Have used their services several years. Always excellent service, and when there are inevitable  problems in the rental units from time to time, always first rate efforts to resolve problems promptly and correctly. Definitely highly recommended.', 'time': 1517245071}, {'author_name': 'Kenneth Jones', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101023941131014989505/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgZkIEfJPdAAYSusPjeTN9WpPxJD_2LNraOkrPyOg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'We could not be happier with the multiple services provided by PVRPV.   The condo we had stayed in, was not available again except for a year in advance, so we booked 14 months in advance.    It is worth it, it feels just like home.   I will recommend PVRPV for anyone coming to Puerto Vallarta for a week or a month.', 'time': 1507840296}, {'author_name': 'Dasya Mansfield', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102250711732309402122/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhIfHkv1042QKU3hXLSs7FlXVUj7Pw_cu-q1Mz-=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'We went on the evening taco stand tour. Excellent experience. Amanda was our guide. Because of this tour we have a better understanding of the culture. You could tell she loves her city and the people. The food at each stand and restaurant we visited was fantastic and days later went back on our own. 
Now that I have a greater understanding of the history and culture of the taco and food stands in Puerto Vallarta I now know they are the places to eat!', 'time': 1522557642}]

price_level_y: great bang for your buck and good location  room was reasonably clean  bed was comfortable  the towels were paper thin and rough but i was still able to dry myself off  the staff were all friendly and helpful  probably the best parking in the romance district  there is definitely things that this hotel could improve on but the price helps overlook them  i would stay there again   good place  location is great and cost is cheap but not worth it  customer service is terrible  the men who work here are rude af  the women are chill they don‚Äôt care what you think   best deal in old town clean rooms  spacious  in the heart of old town bang for the buck some road city noise  thin walls  but overall  if on a budget  beats a hostel if you want privacy   super close to the gay bars  price is very affordable  staff is friendly and discreet  water pressure is great if you are like me and are only going to be in the hotel to shower and sleep it s definitely a great value

[{'author_name': 'Ian Culbert', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114242485111769937505/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhgQniyL8WHIkKKKIzvfvImlpTJUW3iA8va9oFZRA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'The Zenith is a very nice condo development with a spectacular roof-top pool with a great view of the bay and the mountains. Best stay ever!!', 'time': 1559435727}, {'author_name': 'Rachel QueenieMagpie', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107610110948760761591/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gg2QjkF4ue2qsmezFlsDfWOW1teP_reoUnIKLTY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'First time ever at an Air B and B does the concierge come out into traffic to greet and help you crossing the road. Quite unexpected and very welcomed after long flight and Uber ride. Well done. Ps: the place itself is best location and immaculate üëç', 'time': 1554275472}, {'author_name': 'Frank Salah', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117266880765817409650/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgppydRJ7fRljxgFzzKEPxlSSZMFes0u5hOUzm1=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Unit # 206  at Zenith  - the prefect condominium in the ideal location in Puerto Valletta

We stayed at this new and charming condominium in a brand new and modern building located in the heart of the ‚ÄúZona Romantica‚Äù ‚Äì the best location in the old town (only a couple of blocks from the best beach in Puerto Vallarta (Playa los Muertos). 
The rooftop is the best part of this apartment deal; it offers beautiful ocean vistas and overlooks the old down town and the mountains. We enjoyed the rooftop spectacular views very much, the pool/ hot tub, and the gym is awesome. 
This new condo AC is so quiet we barley heard it unlike other condominiums we rented before in Puerto Vallarta. I liked the fact it comes with two full and separate bathrooms and two sinks, one master bedroom and one large living room with a large sofa bed, a charming modern kitchen and dining room seating 4 people with comfort, and a nice balcony as well. I also liked the water filtration system and both large TVs as they come unlimited access to sport channels, movies and Netflix
We rented a car at the airport, I was concerned about parking, but this unit has the best parking and storage in the bundling, it‚Äôs totally underrated. 
The host Salvador was very helpful and checked often on us, this building and unit are  highly recommended, you can‚Äôt beat the view, the location and amenities.', 'time': 1555340532}]

price_level_y: hardest bed ever  i m no hotel snob  i don t care what a hotel has or doesn t have as long as it is clean  we didn t have reservations with the hotel  we just happened to walk in  they had a room available  and we ended up staying for nights  it was clean  it was cheap  it s right by the beach  and i plan to visit again very soon  it doesn t bother me at all  but it is quite noisy  i think that s just part of being right downtown where this hotel is located and part of the experience  but if you re a super light sleeper  you may take issue with it  this hotel is right next to some amazing restaurants and not far at all from the malecon  i highly recommend   puerto vallarta  was not me  excellent environment

user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'JOHN JONES', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115716476164324051010/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-0n8Br0qJQKM/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnWd-F3UYLeELx2Offj4O54pui05A/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Great massage.. very clean', 'time': 1581842067}, {'author_name': 'Lisa Rodriguez', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106249065532024761821/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgXr4zTKLBnKqQyc2OVYrcviBdD_anU_Cu-y37K=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'We had the hour long Therapeutic Couples massage for 900 pesos. The massage was wonderful and the staff very professional.  The store itself is very small. There is a sheet separating the treatment areas which worked out well for us so we could hear each other. I would definitely do it again!', 'time': 1521905565}, {'author_name': 'Christine Windrim', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116627343680104670288/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-f3a64Al-9PA/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnGRlfL-BvJ-_r7DlTvQmJyfr6x4g/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'Had a wonderful and relaxing facial. Highly recommended especially for the price.', 'time': 1514060396}, {'author_name': 'Alfredo Olivas', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114361100734225138835/reviews', 'language': 'es', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhMSKkr6xgoLYIBs-LhHlSfBDxtzJ3G7oYETsvlqA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Me gusto el facial, me relaje tanto que casi me quedaba dormido el √∫nico problema que tuve fue que a la hora de pagar no me aceptaron mi tarjeta de cr√©dito me coment√≥ la persona que s√≥lo efectivo a√∫n cuando en su puerta del negocio tienen un letrero donde dice que aceptan tarjetas de cr√©dito a lo cual la persona me argument√≥ que la terminal no estaba funcionando me hubiera gustado que me comentara eso antes de haber iniciado con el facial porque yo no contaba con todo el efectivo necesario para pagar por el servicio y el cajero que est√° cruzando el pasillo  cobra 94 pesos por disposici√≥n de efectivo ya que es un banco americano. \nNo puedes tener anunciado tu negocio que aceptas tarjetas de cr√©dito y decirle al cliente en persona que no le puede recibir el pago en tarjeta, en todo caso si la terminal no est√° funcionando preg√∫ntale al cliente si trae efectivo para pagar... no? \nA pesar de esto el d√≠a siguiente quise regresar para un masaje relajante llam√© por tel√©fono al n√∫mero que tienen en su tarjeta para hacer cita y me contest√≥ una persona que no sab√≠a para que le estaba yo hablando esta persona no estaba en el negocio, El tel√©fono que aparece en la tarjeta es el n√∫mero celular de alguien no es el n√∫mero del propiamente del negocio. Le pregunt√© que si ya estaba funcionando su terminal para aceptarme el pago con tarjeta porque quer√≠a irme hacer un masaje y no me supo responder porque esta persona como les comento no estaba en el negocio. Tuve buena atenci√≥n el d√≠a que fui hacerme el masaje pero desgraciadamente por detallitos como estos muchas veces a uno como cliente ya no te quedan ganas de regresar a un lugar creo que deben de prestar atenci√≥n a estos detalles para brindar un mejor servicio.', 'time': 1548968897}, {'author_name': 'Humberto Gomez - ESI', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116970543179446611766/reviews', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-cM8IMjmagpM/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckEqTu86D1TAHCurlLDXTkiQu5dIA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': '', 'time': 1567808485}]
price_level_y: great massage very clean  we had the hour long therapeutic couples massage for pesos  the massage was wonderful and the staff very professional the store itself is very small  there is a sheet separating the treatment areas which worked out well for us so we could hear each other  i would definitely do it again   had a wonderful and relaxing facial  highly recommended especially for the price   i liked the facial  i relaxed so much that i almost fell asleep the only problem i had was that at the time of paying they did not accept my credit card  the person told me that only cash even though they have a sign on their business door where it says that they accept credit cards to which the person argued that the terminal was not working i would have liked him to tell me that before starting with the facial because i did not have all the cash necessary to pay for the service and the atm that is across the hall charges pesos for cash disposition since it is an american bank  nyou cannot have your business advertised that you accept credit cards and tell the customer in person that they cannot receive the payment by card  in any case if the terminal is not working ask the customer if they bring cash to pay   right  ndespite this  the next day i wanted to return for a relaxing massage  i called the number on your card to make an appointment and a person answered me who did not know what i was talking about  this person was not in business  that appears on the card is someone s cell phone number  not the number of the business itself  i asked him if his terminal was already working to accept payment by card because he wanted to go for a massage and he did not know how to answer because this person  as i mentioned  was not in business  i had good attention the day i went to get the massage but unfortunately for little details like these many times one as a client no longer wants to return to a place i think they should pay attention to these details to provide a better service
