price_level_x: Callejon de la Igualdad, Alta Vista, Puerto Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'James Jakeway', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114313192160047735324/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-oyn714AcrZ0/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclG50D0hsMMLehCqhKwUyH8C98dTw/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': "Stayed here February 2017.  
The property is nice and all, but it definitely needs some updating.  The bathrooms are open to the room, as in a cinderblock pony wall stall with a makeshift curtain.  Same goes for the shower.   Okay if you're alone in the room, awkward if you're sharing with your spouse, REALLY awkward if you're sharing with someone you don't know intimately. 
 The furniture in the common area needed a refresh.  The seats in the living area were tattered and worn, and the lounge chairs were made of steel so they were ROCK HARD if you didn't use a one of the tattered cushions.  
Pool was pretty, albeit cold to the point you couldn't really get in to enjoy it.  The pool area was almost always shaded, so none of us ever really felt hot enough to be compelled to jump into the cold water.  
The staff was very nice and professional.  The cooks made us the same breakfast every morning, which was fine.  Only utilized them once for dinner and it was excellent.  I will say, I felt like I was being supervised the entire time I was there.  You were never alone in the villa, there was always a staff member present, which is good if you require their services, but bad if you just want solitude.  Maybe that's standard for Mexican villas, but definitely different to this American who is used to renting a vacation house and having it to himself. 
Over all, we had a great time and don't want to discourage anyone from the property.  Will we be back?  Probably not.  We'll look for properties with more updated bathrooms.", 'time': 1578972136}, {'author_name': 'Christine Michelle', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111592389795641594859/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjuNjTXDEvysQhBR7Wfl23xdz75_jD-2joWdoRK=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'We really enjoyed our stay at Villa Las Palmeras.  Juan and Anna were so helpful and were always there for anything we needed.  The views are amazing and most of the rooms have an ocean view.  The pool is a good size and is private.  The rooms are clean, modest accommodations, so if you are expecting Ritz style, then this villa would not be for you.  The house is located on top of a hill, but the staff will call you a taxi or you can easily walk down to zona romantica.  Anna cooks amazing Mexican style meals and Juan makes amazing margaritas.  You really feel you are receiving a true authentic Mexican experience staying here.', 'time': 1550015730}, {'author_name': 'Mike Clarke', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111917551979126616852/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgiqBKY6g5Myc-Jv7qcAo9b6HAJBb5oR-czLe53zg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': "Great place for a venue.. View is great... And the staff better. I would give 5 stars but they don't have any closets and the bathrooms are open.", 'time': 1520347875}, {'author_name': 'Dr. T Wilson', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115184927174637493713/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgShqyn8DTZCptxsdEhUaYtDBTHDlvsq-Ck_upTJ1w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': "RENTER BEWARE! This property is not a representation of it's pictures. We rented this property October 12-16, 2017, under the pretense that we would receive exactly what we saw on the site. However, once we arrived, we were sadly mistaken. The property had not been cleaned in a very long time, many items were broken, bug infestations, etc. The staff on site were very helpful (Juan, Luis, and Ana), but the US contract manager (Naomi) and owner (Sim/Simon) became unresponsive as of the October 13th. We had 22 people in our party and we all had to find other accommodations, at our own expense. THIS PROPERTY IS UNIHABITABLE! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! IT IS A MONEY PIT!!", 'time': 1508295259}, {'author_name': 'Steve Maines', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111910021404915104288/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-M3QL2496aws/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucn4rleEU6LhqPogEJEVXeYmX71z-g/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '3 years ago', 'text': "Book Your Stay Today and Enjoy! 

Our family just returned from a 4 night stay and Wedding...it was amazing! The staff (Juan, Ana, Luis, Daniel and many more) made it home for our family and guests. Ana's cooking was outstanding! Between Villa Las Palmeras and Villa Las Ventanas we had 23 rooms for our 50 family and friends. Naomi was very responsive leading up to our trip as well as helping with any requests during our stay.

We look forward to a return trip!", 'time': 1495031451}]

user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'David Lami', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101794922407015822170/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-bW7dlURd2EM/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckW9PwnOWtVFC46wIP2zjJlxB5uQA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'The most relaxing Villas overlooking Puerto Vallarta. The Pueblo of Puerto Vallarta is in the process of becoming another beach city with construction using cement and stainless steal and glass with no charm. Casa de los Arcos is a traditional Mexican Villa with style, graceful luxury, and peaceful botanical gardens. These botanical gardens have Orchids transferred from the nearby Sierra Madras mountains. A waterfall tumbles down the path to the first of three guest terraces. The view overlooks old town and you know you made the right choice. You have escaped the stressful work-away world into a mountainous paradise overlooking both the Pacific Ocean and old town Vallarta. You are minutes walk to Banderas Bay, restaurants, bars, the board walk , all shops and stores in town. Then the third terrace with outstanding views, a jacuzzi and private bath with an extraordinary m√°tate‚Äô shower! No where else will you find such luxuries. To relax in the jacuzzi next to yet another waterfall that sounds as if it came from a cascading river. [{'author_name': 'Matthew Lysakowski', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114742075066640838124/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-6tP9dQJGGzA/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckIBdW7S86FcHlcYxgeCBCHRFKkCw/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': "We have stayed twice for several weeks. Several people including myself and a staff member contracted Dengue while staying here.  I mentioned to the owner that there are allot of mosquitoes in our room she did nothing. We saw mosquito traps but none where in use.  Owners daughter is in the wrong business.  Very rude.  We won't be back.
Dec 2018", 'time': 1579116544}, {'author_name': 'donald tse', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101332517105322539670/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gjqtyw1tLCIcn3SONUQlZD-UlzMy66oZbKmkPTVKQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'The hotel had great view and pretty clean. Also does not have an elevator, so if you rent a room on the top floor,  you are screwed!', 'time': 1581265522}, {'author_name': 'Rin Del', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108712252204417283598/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-8NBEH9iM0Kg/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmbSKv0i0-gBGnYPRFBG2LUSl9eEQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 2, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'Unit 7 was ok.

Can't beat the price, just be advised you do have to go up steps to get to your room.", 'time': 1557425922}, {'author_name': 'Nima Sakian', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104528759223829248367/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjXy0ahx9FVJ0p8BSu5l5cyUTjpLN_tvsqvh_AVc74=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'my father is staying here and really enjoys it. very clean and close to everything.', 'time': 1557178846}]

price_level_x: L√°zaro C√°rdenas 567, Emiliano Zapata, Puerto Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Steven Gibson', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104787797344984161270/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-pQnFe82dNqY/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckATkloMYnafDYUZB8ViGKI_Ze7bA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'This is a wonderful place to stay while in Puerto Vallarta. The stunning manicured, colorful garden greets you upon arrival. The owner Scott in very attentive and insist that your stay is on the level of excellence. I will stay here again and again. I very highly recommend this Resort.', 'time': 1593305574}, {'author_name': 'Brytiago Renato Kurt', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100962684480998849064/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiILfQvdMFMPyHumgQ524OM81QBmJV6yuOkStlE-A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'Amazing place , the best Experience', 'time': 1584622901}, {'author_name': 'Melisa Venegas', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106263478737521786773/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Ggm4qO4bV2tduWKvwdkVGz9FfP9oRTA-UVAyIB9Aw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Dreamy place, great design, cozy feeling- close to the fun parts of town', 'time': 1564659238}, {'author_name': 'John Hotchkiss', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107125446405455584619/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gja2BDDm65l6J7JO1ryV3mNTnK1EkvebdqajkchUA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "Should\xa0the world be\xa0overrun by zombies this might be the last stand.\xa0 More than an oasis, it's an ark.\xa0 More than an ark, it's an island.\xa0 More to the point:\xa0More than a BnB it is a labor of love.\xa0 Escondida means hidden, and that is apt, but the care put into this special place is apparent.

The propriator has fashioned a courtyard arboretum of myriad greens, water-sprite fountains and fluorescent blossoms\xa0topped with a 3 story treehouse (including\xa0stereo, tv, honor bar, daybed, disco ball and killer views), a sanctuary for a\xa0skyfull of cheerful, sometimes riotous\xa0birds and a half dozen beautiful villas arranged hacienda style so each faces the stunning\xa0courtyard.

Our 1\xa0bedroom\xa0villa had a well equipped full kitchen with bar style counter\xa0seating for dining and a couple of couches and small\xa0tables\xa0in an adjacent sitting area.\xa0 Decoration was\xa0simple and stylish: tile, wood, iron, masonry and\xa0stonework accented by rich colors.\xa0 The bedroom, with\xa0a\xa0luxuriously comfortable king bed, cold\xa0ac and large,internet\xa0connected\xa0flatscreen, had\xa0more closet space than you likely have at home.\xa0 The modern\xa0bathroom featured dual showerheads in an\xa0artfully\xa0tiled tub big enough for all the passengers in a clown car.\xa0 Each room had skylights,\xa0dimmable lighting and ceiling fans.\xa0\xa0Our villa was insular and quiet at night despite the goings on around us;\xa0 every night was restful.\xa0The two villas on the upper floor share a large, sunny, patio with chaises,\xa0a\xa0table with chairs and a wide\xa0view of the nearby mountainside.

At the rear of the garden a pool and patio area include plenty of sunny or\xa0shaded seating and chaises, a hot tub, hamaca suspended over the pool, outdoor pool shower and convenient private\xa0bathroom/changeroom/shower for those on the upper floor or day\xa0pass guests.

At night the garden becomes a luminus eden of color,
as though bird-like stars of every chromaticity have left the heavens to roost in the trees.\xa0 Then, perhaps, a multimedia show may begin with a towering 17x22 foot screen projected on the wall behind the pool and quality stereo sound emanating from a sweet Bose setup.\xa0 It was awesome\xa0fun to enjoy the sound and vision from the poolside\xa0rocking chairs

The location on the quiet end of Calle\xa0 Lazaro Cardenas, has great markets (including, fortunately for us,\xa0 a tiny farmacia liquer store across the street),\xa0good\xa0restaurants nearby and the meandering\xa0Cuale River sidewalk stroll a mere block east.\xa0 Straight west down the street is a colorful 8 block\xa0walk to the Malecon and any number of side streets offer discoveries\xa0and potential diversions.

The hacienda is so immaculate Jesus would stay here.... or perhaps my 65 year old\xa0wife, Mary, could unaccountably become with child.\xa0The place has a cribbage board, too!

A buffet breakfast as fresh and large as the morning is served at 9 bells on the patio\xa0while guests catch each other up on adventures and offer insights or perspectives.

The treehouse (which deserves one more mention), is\xa0a local landmark and wonder of\xa0the greater world. It\xa0is also a comfortable, high perch for\xa0watching\xa0the daily bustle of locals.\xa0 Few, if any, will notice you noticing them.\xa0 It is also a romantic spot and a sublime place for a siesta.\xa0 Maybe even a fiesta, but the inebriated should be forewarned about the climb down.

Sally, Lance and Wally, the owners 3 dogs usually greeted me in the morning.\xa0 Calm and gentle\xa0Sally (black lab) just wanted\xa0some love, Lance (a German shepard pup) wanted to play and Wally (also a\xa0lab) just wanted to be left alone as he patrolled; just leave Wally to himself and all will be fine.

I'll offer extra points for being\xa0eco friendly (most of the electrical is provided by solar) and for having triple filtered potable water so we could forego stocking up on the\xa0bottled variety. Wifi was good throughout the property.

Scott, the proprietor, is social, funny, helpful and truely became an Amigo.\xa0 This is the kind of place you will miss and long to return to;\xa0 I started to proactively\xa0miss it the day before I checked out.", 'time': 1554224496}, {'author_name': 'Jeff Coomes', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115382526263175233444/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gg13nd02wVpEUQyHjY3s9JW17MQ0O_XlW7hkgkihg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Omg not sure were to start. Friendly  clean little oasis. Must stay', 'time': 1536680358}]

user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Joe M', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117561491588729933640/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-JNZzd3vJKo4/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmmV6ih5utnZVohRoo7hjb5TbQFIQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '8 months ago', 'text': 'Rolando Donato is a gem. price_level_y: great little place  unlike most of the similarly priced hotels in this area  this place has thermal windows to keep street noise out and they even have a little pool to cool off in  better than the hotels on fsc  madero at the same price point   great location  okay rooms for good price   good service  after a long trip we arrived in varta and we couldn t find a hotel  everything was very expensive  it was approximately  we thought we would sleep in the car but a good man sent us there and it really is an inexpensive place near the center and very good service without a doubt  if i would return  it is a simple place to rest  take a quick shower with lukewarm water and spend a peaceful night  i wish the pool had a little cleaner water  we couldn t use it during our stay

user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Janice Fairchild', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107424714570990464162/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-9eN279UQ7Wo/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclGEdwoK6yChqXZ3-Em5hfolW013Q/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'We loved C√°rdenas Suites.  It is a quiet neighborhood at night, but walking distance to lots of restaurants,  bars and other entertainment.  Taco stands, too.  Jeremy and Henry were great hosts and we had everything we could have wanted.  They even gave us a complimentary margarita at a nearby restaurant.  We hope to be back with them again.  Oh, and I forgot to mention that they have a great, on-demand hot water system.  Truly like being home!', 'time': 1582938517}, {'author_name': 'RyVida SJ', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103033541902338953918/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GivggKXk2lKGkIrJRUbthHAH80CBAM8LmZgTKVBBQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'Our stay at C√°rdenas suites was perfect in every way possible. First off the hosts Jeremy and Henry went over and beyond any Host we have ever had. They accommodated us last minute allowed us early check in and late check out so that my husband could work. They were friendly and gracious making sure all of our needs were met.\nSecond and just as important was the apartment. We loved the neighborhood, in our opinion it is the best in PV. price_level_y: we loved c√°rdenas suites it is a quiet neighborhood at night  but walking distance to lots of restaurants bars and other entertainment taco stands  too jeremy and henry were great hosts and we had everything we could have wanted they even gave us a complimentary margarita at a nearby restaurant we hope to be back with them again oh  and i forgot to mention that they have a great  on demand hot water system truly like being home   our stay at c√°rdenas suites was perfect in every way possible  first off the hosts jeremy and henry went over and beyond any host we have ever had  they accommodated us last minute allowed us early check in and late check out so that my husband could work  they were friendly and gracious making sure all of our needs were met  nsecond and just as important was the apartment  we loved the neighborhood  in our opinion it is the best in pv  the beds were so comfortable  the kitchen and bathrooms were beautifully updated  the nicest shower i have ever been in  we spent hours on the balcony watching the world go by  there are not water views but the sun setting behind the church every night was plenty of view for us  we will absolutely book again when we go back to pv  hopefully soon  cardenas suites provided us with a great location to spend our time in puerto vallarta   perfect place to stay  no noise  great suites  great area  great owners  great beds  perfect   love c√°rdenas suites  henry jeremy are very accommodating and helpful and the suites are well appointed and the location is perfect

user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Slava Sponitz', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116384160642249497068/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjO4RVkj92SmLTrhToQYwAQKPtCKkZH8okMfVttxA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '8 months ago', 'text': 'Very small and private resort with clean and private beach and multiple pools. Every room in this resort has an ocean front view. With an excellent staff and services, but very mediocre food and drinks. There are four restaurants, sport bar and small buffet on the territory.', 'time': 1576080784}, {'author_name': 'Andrew Spitzer', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113365630344634595320/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gg8p7Qtms8DHRz0UOifXhtmEP5trYn2sKE9UNo0cQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'We were happy with the resort. It is not to big or small. We had an ocean view room with a jacuzzi tub on the balcony. The entertainment staff were excellent especially Mary Lou and Alex. My wife really enjoyed aerobics in the main pool. It was easy to get chairs around the pool and on the beach. For us the restaurants were good, not great. Blaze the Brazilian steak house the service was slow at dinner and super slow for breakfast. The main buffet had a good selection. I do not eat meat and was able to find enough vegetarian and vegan options. The Wednesday night Mexican night was a lot of fun. The cafe made good coffee according to my wife as I do not drink it. The sports bar with a pool table was great. We would definately come back. Pick the club tower as the rooms are renovated and there is a bar and snack room on the main floor. The ocean is so close it sounds like it is right outside the balcony.', 'time': 1580444946}, {'author_name': 'Meego Yassin', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107379171210394463416/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhQDDK1kEQ_rQyxttKHo_4yR0kyIjA7gdfWI6dNRw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'Great customer service. price_level_y: very small and private resort with clean and private beach and multiple pools  every room in this resort has an ocean front view  with an excellent staff and services  but very mediocre food and drinks  there are four restaurants  sport bar and small buffet on the territory   we were happy with the resort  it is not to big or small  we had an ocean view room with a jacuzzi tub on the balcony  the entertainment staff were excellent especially mary lou and alex  my wife really enjoyed aerobics in the main pool  it was easy to get chairs around the pool and on the beach  for us the restaurants were good  not great  blaze the brazilian steak house the service was slow at dinner and super slow for breakfast  the main buffet had a good selection  i do not eat meat and was able to find enough vegetarian and vegan options  the wednesday night mexican night was a lot of fun  the cafe made good coffee according to my wife as i do not drink it  the sports bar with a pool table was great  we would definately come back  pick the club tower as the rooms are renovated and there is a bar and snack room on the main floor  the ocean is so close it sounds like it is right outside the balcony   great customer service  rooms are ok  a bit old but not too bad  the food is average but i‚Äôm not a ‚Äúall inclusive‚Äù fan  pools are nice md drinks are really weak  but once again it‚Äôs Unfortunately this resort was the complete opposite. It was a HUGE disappointment. 
Check-in: We requested an early check in as our flight arrived at 11AM. We were traveling with our 8 month old for the first time so you‚Äôd think they could have been a little more accommodating. They weren‚Äôt. After getting lunch, the room was still not ready so we had to change in their lobby... 
Rooms: The rooms were dated and the shower didn‚Äôt work properly. It constantly changed from cold to hot without me touching anything. It almost burned my son. I called the front desk, they sent up someone from maintenance but he didn‚Äôt solve the issue. Showers the entire trip were a nightmare. The bedding was also horrid. The hotel uses some sort of plastic mattress protector which was not only uncomfortable but causes you to wake up soaked in your own sweat.
Food: The restaurants were not opened as advertised. We went to the Asian restaurant one night and it was randomly closed. We arrived at 9:30PM, the restaurant is supposed to close at 11PM. Same thing happened the following night... We went to the Brazilian restaurant this time around 9:30PM and again closed... Supposed to be open until 11:00PM. The Buffet was probably one of the smallest I‚Äôve seen. We went in, walked around and left without getting anything. 
Service: Probably the only good thing about this place. The staff were friendly but I mean you can get that at most resorts. 

My husband and I have stayed at a few Hyatt properties and this was BY FAR the worst!', 'time': 1576040928}]

From the very start everything was great. We walked in and were immediately attended to. The service itself was great and attentive, yet not overbearing. The view of the Bahia Banderas from the property is outstanding and the surroundings are calm and full of nature.
The rooms were very clean, were upscale and luxurious, and had decoration and design that made it feel local and Mexican. 
The facilities are first class, including a gym with all the necessary equipment, pools overlooking the bay, and jacuzzis to dip in and relax.
 Everything was perfect and we really enjoyed our stay. I hope to be back very soon in this special place.
I would certainly recommend it to anyone.', 'time': 1548347264}, {'author_name': 'Ryan Sammer', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101191634319553933043/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhNx3uZpVl5aq7wa-YueD_vic9tcJfDKpITtfwnQQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'I have never given one star reviews but we were kidnapped by a security guard at his hotel. Our flight home from Puerto Vallarta was very early in the morning and we informed our hotel staff the last night of our stay and asked if we could pay for the $80 resort fee on our credit card. They assured us it was fine and we should pay in the morning with the overnight security guard. That morning we wake up very early to leave as we have a rental car to fill up and return. We told the guard we would like to pay and leave. He scanned our card for 20 minutes and said that the machine had "no connection" but that our card was not declined. We told him we could not wait any longer and gave him the last of our cash which was about $50. He said we needed to go to an ATM with him outside of the Villa. We told him no we do not have our debit cards. This would be extremely dangerous because it was very early in the morning on a Sunday which means not banks are open. He wanted us to go to an unsupervised ATM outside of the hotel which meant he could basically rob us blind as no one was around. We are now begging him to let us out as we are running very late and he had us LOCKED IN THE HOUSE. We make a deal with him to take the last $20 we had to use on the rental car if we could fill up at the local gas station with our credit card, and if not then we cant pay any more. He agrees and when we get to the gas station they say they do not accept card. He now threatens us that if we do not go with him to another hotel that "we would not be leaving Mexico" as he dials someone his phone. We are extremely scared and pleading to let us leave but we are now kidnapped by this security guard and are about to miss our flight so we have no choice but to go with this man to a random hotel at 6 in the morning. He takes us to a hotel that we had never seen and proceeds to charge us the full amount even though I gave him $50 in cash. After paying we were finally able to run away to our rental car and barely made our flight. 

It is very sad that I have to write this review because we usually have such an awesome and safe time in Mexico. Unfortunately some businesses in Mexico believe that they can operate this way. I would seriously not recommend staying here. Something as simple as a broken credit card on their end could end up getting you stuck in Mexico or worse.', 'time': 1522792555}]

user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Andrew Lunt', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107338333306620836693/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiwCaIov9TJG2EcLxptT6FTr5LKMtW6FYyssD-M0NY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': "My wife and I stayed at Casa Benito with my parents, sister and brother-in-law over the Christmas holiday. Casa Benito is conveniently located within walking distance to the beach, local restaurants and not far away from the boardwalk. There was plenty of space for the 6 of us and the rooftop terrace was fairly private and a great place to hang out at night. We were able to arrange a ziplining tour at the hotel's front desk. Both front desk attendants were quite friendly and helpful. Jean Claude was especially helpful when issues arose. The last day we were there we had issue with our water. We ended up having to shower at the hotel next door and limit our water use in the condo. Jean Claude was helpful during this less than ideal situation. We also had an issue with no AC the first night we were at the condo, which was taken care of the next day.", 'time': 1578893243}, {'author_name': 'George Coulling', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100182018740206078623/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgYWOssrI3SSHaWsa1IQZKp3VCVQcEQjAnO-ADy=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'Booked for my family of 7 adults and one toddler for 8 days at Christmas. price_level_y: my wife and i stayed at casa benito with my parents  sister and brother in law over the christmas holiday  casa benito is conveniently located within walking distance to the beach  local restaurants and not far away from the boardwalk  there was plenty of space for the of us and the rooftop terrace was fairly private and a great place to hang out at night  we were able to arrange a ziplining tour at the hotel s front desk  both front desk attendants were quite friendly and helpful  jean claude was especially helpful when issues arose  the last day we were there we had issue with our water  we ended up having to shower at the hotel next door and limit our water use in the condo  jean claude was helpful during this less than ideal situation  we also had an issue with no ac the first night we were at the condo  which was taken care of the next day   booked for my family of adults and one toddler for days at christmas  casa benito was as advertised and perfectly suited for our needs  jean claude and rodrigo were extremely accommodating and lupita supplies great maid service  we would definitely stay there again  ni was originally concerned about getting to the beach and into town but that proved to be no problem  we walked to both quite often and it was very easy to use uber  taxis  or the mismaloya bus   the place is  passable  but it would be more pleasant if they maintained the pool   in my opinion  it pays too much for the service per day of air conditioning its beautiful your photos jc

price_level_x: Amapas 380, Emiliano Zapata, Puerto Vallarta
rating_y: Almar Resort Luxury LGBT Beach Front Experience
user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'John Wiltfang', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117128376028231507268/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-TBOuXR_O6DY/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuck9gXxrlOENRfGlto8EZ1qILmcw7Q/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'Waited 20 minutes for a drink and totally ignored so we left.  Really sucks because its a beautiful view from the roof top bar,  but the service is REALLY BAD.  We live here fulltime and really disappointed in this business..going to be hard to recommend.  Without good service your just another overpriced hotel with watered down drinks.', 'time': 1592629735}, {'author_name': 'Robert Albano', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109918003365009363206/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhSTudJL4_6TfpeTfuZqf8NheF_j-9X7WGCrB3yxw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'I just returned July 21,2020. Amazing resort, excellent proactive Covid-19 procedures. The resort is very clean with amazing rooms & amenities. The managers & staff very professional and accommodating. Guests actually have access to Mantamar Beach Club & provide free shuttle The TOP BAR has the best food/drinks unbelievable sunset views. The TOP BAR staff are the kindness, professionals bi-lingual also Their DJ plays great music. The construction improvements are not even noticeable as the resort does everything to make your stay enjoyable. This resort is close to airport, center, Malecon, boardwalk & very inexpensive to Uber around. I was here for 14 days & i am a particular traveller i cannot find any flaws with this resort. You can exchange currency at resort, room service, tours etc. the housekeeping is beyond anything i have ever experienced, you will have no regrets if you stay at Almar  myself and my guests will definitely return. RobertüòÄ', 'time': 1595458076}, {'author_name': 'Ser Coronado', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114776578762768208667/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjTmZjW_tRQAZ_BHdum_Yzbb2V30PsVBxjpdZEjC3g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'I stayed here thinking I was going to get an LGBTQ+ experience, and girl what an experience I had! For starters, there is MAJOR construction right next door, so if you want to rest and not have to wake up at the crack of dawn to the sounds of hammers hammering and drills drilling, I recommend you search for a quieter option and don‚Äôt stay here. Next, if you‚Äôre a solo traveler, this place is not for you- the lack of attention to detail to make you feel at home was subpar for an establishment charging upwards of $300 a night- certainly NOT Mexican standards, a real shame. The staff can be pretentious and ‚Äúuppity‚Äù, when it came to going that extra step in customer service. For example, I waited forever for my breakfast, that never came- when I complained, they didn‚Äôt seem to care or offer an alternative; when I tried to park in front but then was asked to park somewhere else although later I saw cars parked in the same exact spot I wanted to park in; when I was chased down the hall to put my mask on, even after I had my mask on in the lobby (required) and took it off in the hallway, with no one around; when the hot tub didn‚Äôt hold the water and when they supposedly came by to fix it, nobody checked in with me later to see that it was OK; when asked to go to the beach I was directed to the stairs (VERY LONG WALK) and wasn‚Äôt told about the shuttle that can take you; when trying to get a massage, only to find myself trying to find the massage therapist in Mantamar. Later, I find they aren‚Äôt supposed to even be offering massages because of the COVID health crisis! In any case, with so many options- I would stay away from Almar and find a pleasant experience elsewhere. Traveler beware!', 'time': 1593696095}, {'author_name': 'Cal Coupon', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104145717390028489829/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-nCBAZ3o4QFw/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnxtGjXFjD2wEF_av4XvpVxlQlozg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'After staying here on a regular basis for years and bringing many new loyal clients this resort shows absolutely no loyalty and does not recognize their regulars.  I booked a ‚Äúdeluxe ocean view suite‚Äù and they put me on the bottom floor.  Terrible room and not what I paid for.  I booked way in advance and they stuck me at the bottom.  Absolutely appalling how they treat their loyal repeat customers.  I informed the desk that I was promised a nicer room and this was not what I booked but they did not care.  They do not care about regular customers and you‚Äôre just another paying random guest.  This stay has ruined my opinion of this place and there are FAR better buildings close by for way less $ and better accommodations.  So disappointing.', 'time': 1583912957}, {'author_name': 'Lawrence Thompson', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116380391075701621328/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/--HSJhFa4v30/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckUq5TOMQXvcxD21fFBWdTAeA75cw/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': "Horrible business practices. Denied refund for leaving early, on a REFUNDABLE rate, with 2 days advance notice, and after being PROMISED a refund several times.

We decided to stay 2 more nights, and pre-paid for the 2 additional nights at the front desk (and didn't sign anything). Only 3 hours after extending the reservation by 2 nights, we found out the airlines didn't have flights on our new check-out date due to COVID, so literally THREE HOURS later, I asked the front desk if we could change the reservation extension to just 1 additional night, instead of 2 additional nights. They said that's not a problem, and that we would get a refund for the 2nd additional night. They kept making excuses why the manager who does the refund wasn't showing up for work, and they couldn't put the refund through without her. Finally on checkout, they had me fill out a blank credit card refund slip, so they could supposedly process the refund. 

Been back and forth for weeks by email and phone trying to get this refunded. They put us through about $500 worth of hassle for a $120 refund, and they are just ADAMANT on wrongfully keeping our money, and after we were actually PROMISED a refund in person several times!! 

Finally, weeks later, they told me there's some policy which I was never shown, saying that when you shorten a reservation that's in progress you NEVER get a refund, no matter how much notice you give (even though it was shortened with 2 days advance notice, during COVID, and shortened 3 hours after it was lengthened, and even though we were SPECIFICALLY PROMISED a refund when we shortened it, and even though the reservation was made at the hotel desk and not through a 3rd party). 

Under this hotel's ridiculous policy, if you had a 14-day trip which was originally fully refundable, and left after 1 night, they would still keep your money for all 13 nights you didn't use! So if you planed on staying here 14-nights, I would recommend booking 14 different 1-night reservations, so you don't get stuck with an unpleasant surprise if your plans change. 

They just do everything they can to keep your money, and LIE LIE LIE! Promised a refund that was later denied. AVOID AVOID AVOID", 'time': 1593228961}]

We stayed in Guadalupe 1st floor right in the beach. Staff super friendly and nice. No breakfast on Sunday but the cook gave us fruit and danish on Saturday night. Rooms not cleaned on Sunday either (no big deal). Walk to town is a bit of a hike but doable.', 'time': 1580092149}, {'author_name': 'Max Haustein', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118231103984508355094/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-9TSw1195thM/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclAfEzLB497VTuKF_cCXRS-d-MHcQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '11 months ago', 'text': 'Best hotel we have been in for a long time, loved our stay! It is very romantic small hotel, ideal for pairs or small families. 

Interior was local as well and made the stay very authentic. Direct beach access, and just 15min walk on the beach until you are in the city centre.

This is not an average hotel where you are treated like 100 others. This is something special!

We are Germans and were very pleased from the whole atmosphere.

Recommended!', 'time': 1568730424}, {'author_name': 'Luis Nuno', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117089066999890575790/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gi7BJp2IapWjKXelSDhlSGS1uPd8AeTjYhwi6_EWRc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': "My wife and I stayed here last year and couldn't have been happier.  Every one was very hospitable and the rooms where awesome. It felt like we went back in time (in a good way).", 'time': 1529701096}, {'author_name': 'Ray South Spokane', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108620343120428795471/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-PPzFDIQOwqs/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmRrpothI8h5ciTqQUEmhpJtIUHDg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'We had a great time. Roberto was excellent.  We loved the authentic Mexican feel.  Beautiful view!  Breakfast each morning was outstanding.  Very clean and well kept.  We will be back.  Soon we hope!', 'time': 1528344531}, {'author_name': 'Lulu C', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104177917444639405969/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-gp4LLi81fJA/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckWuDpMbjhHuKwvQy58LtToWDijpA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '3 years ago', 'text': "This place has good qualities...but please read to the end if you are not a fan of haunted hotels. Quinta Maria Cortez has a wonderful, accommodating staff (make sure you meet Roberto upon arrival!!). The walk to shopping/most restaurants and nightlife is treacherous during high-tide as you must climb rugged rocks. As long as you budget $60-70 Mexican dollars ($3-$4 US) each way, once or twice each day, you'll be fine taking a taxi. All the restaurants seemed reasonable and we never had a bad meal. 
Their Swimming pool is ridiculously small, and beach is rocky unless you walk to neighboring spots, but the made-to-order breakfasts are impressive!! Now to the weird stuff...the owner claimed no knowledge of a haunting, but myself and a friend became overwhelmed by something unexplained. I've since read reviews calling Raphael creepy and that the overall place had a feel of being haunted. No kidding that some kind of dark energy exists here. Without going into details, me and my friend, in separate rooms, independently heard really strange sounds (not old house sounds), followed by increasingly bizarre coincidences. I've never experienced anything like this, and something isn't right here. 
I think travelers deserve the history/truth about places like this before they prepay like I did, worst vacation of my life. Good luck!!", 'time': 1485837292}]

rooms not cleaned on sunday either  no big deal walk to town is a bit of a hike but doable   best hotel we have been in for a long time  loved our stay  it is very romantic small hotel  ideal for pairs or small families n ninterior was local as well and made the stay very authentic  direct beach access  and just walk on the beach until you are in the city centre  n nthis is not an average hotel where you are treated like others  this is something special  n nwe are germans and were very pleased from the whole atmosphere  n nrecommended   my wife and i stayed here last year and couldn t have been happier every one was very hospitable and the rooms where awesome  it felt like we went back in time  in a good way  we had a great time  roberto was excellent we loved the authentic mexican feel beautiful view breakfast each morning was outstanding very clean and well kept we will be back soon we hope   this place has good qualities but please read to the end if you are not a fan of haunted hotels  quinta maria cortez has a wonderful  accommodating staff  make sure you meet roberto upon arrival   the walk to shopping most restaurants and nightlife is treacherous during high tide as you must climb rugged rocks  as long as you budget  mexican dollars us  each way  once or twice each day  you ll be fine taking a taxi  all the restaurants seemed reasonable and we never had a bad meal ntheir swimming pool is ridiculously small  and beach is rocky unless you walk to neighboring spots  but the made to order breakfasts are impressive now to the weird stuff the owner claimed no knowledge of a haunting  but myself and a friend became overwhelmed by something unexplained  i ve since read reviews calling raphael creepy and that the overall place had a feel of being haunted  no kidding that some kind of dark energy exists here  without going into details  me and my friend  in separate rooms  independently heard really strange sounds  not old house sounds followed by increasingly bizarre coincidences  i ve never experienced anything like this  and something isn t right here ni think travelers deserve the history truth about places like this before they prepay like i did  worst vacation of my life  good luck

[{'author_name': 'Eric Christensen', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114401298063205713886/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-hDOY8h4RD4k/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucm6RdxXaPu2IcLdRcuR_Pwe4380Lg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '8 months ago', 'text': "Meh.  I was a little disappointed by this place. 

It has a pretty good location, close to both the beach and town. And the staff was mostly pretty friendly and helpful.  My problem is with the management.  First there is a fair amount of upkeep needed. But my biggest issue is that it feels like they are penny pinching and a little petty.  They counted the batteries in the remote control on checkout. They sell water to the guests rather than provide drinkable water.. They tried to charge me for the towels I left in the pool area instead of turning them into the front desk.  And they tried to charge me a late check-out fee even though I had already discuss checking out an hour late with another manager.

Overall it wasn't horrible,  but I won't go back there.", 'time': 1576384303}, {'author_name': 'David B', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101432512866267188373/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gj5uWSxergFnhw2sU2dgXnERxdrgpjxXxF0C5iOI6w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 3, 'relative_time_description': '8 months ago', 'text': 'Very friendly and helpful staff with clean but dated facilities in need of renovations.', 'time': 1577737871}, {'author_name': 'Hun Lee Photography', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107932661625293610251/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgLqbZumuBeQ8cdk0DzaiESRTtsnMT8LBf4eSdWMQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'Great place to stay in PV. user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Todd Jensen', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111631255344238637823/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiLl8zsdN4q7JzDzseAJbuc84zE0biIQ0-nltqv=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'The staff is amazing. I am really hoping to make this a yearly trip.', 'time': 1579197155}, {'author_name': 'Heather Does Yoga Stuff', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107921806727351875247/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhQOuQ8HqR6A9df69OfYWSUuSqi5Q4l5EGDk7-lqQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '10 months ago', 'text': 'There are no words to express how pleased we were with our experience. The hardest part was leaving the staff at the end of our stay. They are such beautiful people, we cannot wait to return to Casa La Villita and see them again! 

You will want for absolutely nothing. Fili, the house manager, will make sure you are taken care of at all times (regardless of your needs). Victor, the wait staff, is an absolute ray of sunshine. Every meal Lupita, the gourmet chef, made was impeccable. Claudia, the housekeeper, makes sure the place (including your room)  is always spotless. 

This was probably the best vacation experience EVER!  You will want to come back time and time again.', 'time': 1571423573}, {'author_name': 'Allison Noon', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117211266156316995821/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-cf37QPiEjZc/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnatP9fT5bqKnfbMY695Ot5EFR7rw/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': "Our family of 29 had an amazing Christmas vacation here. This is our second time to come to the Villita and we have been so pleased both times! We had enough room for all and it was great that all rooms have their own bathrooms. This home is absolutely amazing. The grounds are gorgeous, it is spacious and spread out so that your large group has plenty of room. There are numerous patios where you can catch sun or read a book. The pool is big enough for everyone and a great place to hang out. The rooms are perfectly appointed--you won't need anything! 

The staff makes this place extra special. Fili and Victor make sure every need is met and cater to the guests constantly. They are so kind and make sure your drink is refilled or will help you with any excursions or recommendations. Lupe's cooking is outstanding-- there was never a bad meal. She is a gourmet chef and we loved the meals. Claudia keeps the place spotless, cleaning the rooms daily. We love the closeness to the beach, the pool, the food, but especially the friendships we've created with these fabulous people that work here. Casa La Villita is truly a treasure!! 

Thank you to Karla, the owner, she is so easy to work with and answered so many questions that we all had before hand. Thanks to all for a special Christmas with family. We can't recommend this place enough!", 'time': 1546480860}, {'author_name': 'Steve Edwards - Sitivi', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108009287998600928685/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjrOOgU6c_AA2vQ2uuvetk6lDDQ0usCYDfSNm-fPFY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a year ago', 'text': 'So many rooms, you could bring 30 people and barely meet, it feels endless. The  place  is  spotless.', 'time': 1544752898}, {'author_name': 'Krista Kujat', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117330278757185802574/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjfVTq4IRnvWJ5aoPTX-zUYF0zNfHTkDL8sVLFb=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': "I facilitated a women's retreat at Casa La Villita and could not have been more thrilled with the caliber of care, service  and amenities we received.  The on-site staff was continually attentive to our daily needs, and went over and above all expectations when they served our special 'blind folded dinner' which I'd curated for my group.  Karla is a dream to work with - she's thoughtful, attentive to detail, generous and kind.  The workshop room we gathered in daily has beautiful light and views of the luscious garden. It was perfect for the kind of healing work we were doing.   I'll definitely be facilitating the next retreat there and can't wait to return!", 'time': 1523840502}]

[{'author_name': 'Linda Lee', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108406789058654519908/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhT2XduR8ch_sUvVWpJT3qnP7b8xPnfVKAUzcZeFg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Everything about this resort is amazing!!!! Attended a wedding here and fell in love. It was truly beautiful. The rooms were amazing. The views. The bathtub. The rooftop pool. The pools were all amazing! The trolley service. The food. The private beach. The atmosphere. The hammocks on the balconies. The service. Literally, everything. The views. Just amazing. I travel A LOT. I stay in top notch places and this one was way, way, way up there on my list!!!  Loved it!', 'time': 1596498728}, {'author_name': 'Katelyn Herrera', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107555264317388391114/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-LOhkegCbSZE/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckxTRSnektTVIPwaS3DntXdiextLA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'The place ever!! We have stayed here both with and without kids and both stays were absolutely fantastic. The service is impeccable! The best part about it with the kids is the KIDS CLUB! Its free and they have amazing activities for them during the day. Very educational and fun!', 'time': 1596562308}, {'author_name': 'issgman', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111174522162507383261/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GizVpHwD2OYWHvmVrjYu9cOAAuRibk6cX8Pb5OAxQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': "There isn't enough space to describe this place. It's a must see, stay and play.  The roof top bar and saltwater infinity pool is the bomb. Model Especial all day with pool menu that takes the cake. We were totally isolated during this crazy time in the world, and no better place to recuperate from life.", 'time': 1594334990}, {'author_name': 'complete Singh', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110265638244090068755/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-Q_E5TrArTqE/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAPI8/AMZuuclmnT1Jj1pi7TSnplkKszxWQihN3Q/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'in the last week', 'text': "Wouldn't recommend it. Overpriced, gym, tennis courts and pools are very far from one another and require a bus for transportation.  Menus don't mention some items not included in all inclusive menu!

Too many options in beautiful puerto vallarta to swing wrong on this one.

Also waiters are aggressive and thuggish.
There are 100s of empty hotels in PV yearning for tourists. You can get way more value than this place and avoid taking a bus just to go to a pool or restaurant.", 'time': 1599189222}, {'author_name': 'Melissa Terwilliger', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105686254657079655930/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-94-XBooO17g/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckrccoIO1X3xHlc3x4OdpunABmKVQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a week ago', 'text': 'Exceptional views and an exceptional facility with a fantastic staff in a great location. This resort is located between Los Cabos and San Jose giving you the option each day to experience activities in either city. We enjoyed the low pressure and quaint shops in San Jose with very gracious shopkeepers. We enjoyed the marina and the food from all the waterfront restaurants in Los Cabos. This location gives you the opportunity to experience both cities and a world class resort.

We had the best romantic dinner for 2 and had wonderful views on the beach and enjoyed the resort and highly recommend it for others.

Jose Angel the butler was fantastic and super helpful. Brian Wyborn the Sales Manager was a great representative of the Tafer brand and did all he could to protect the customer. Mariana Mendoza the concierge did all she could to make sure we had an exceptional visit and took great care of us. The valet parking staff of Victor and Alberto took care of our every need and made sure they delivered the most exceptional services available and represented the resort in extraordinary fashion. Melanie at the front desk made check in effortless and went out of her way to assist with anything else. The entire staff is exceptional, and they made us feel welcome and safe.

William and I want to thank the entire staff for the fantastic visit we had.

We had a wonderful visit and highly recommend this property to anyone looking for great service, great views, and a romantic location.', 'time': 1598634559}]

Thank you Hotel Mousai for being the best there is in MY BELOVED PUERTO VALLARTA!', 'time': 1594844652}, {'author_name': 'Uyen Truong', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100150288231201774854/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-1Gx4-Be33X8/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclhvikxQnxX-5kU7Ue5gXjSK6zR3g/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'I was here 2017 for our vacation and loved every moment. I am still waiting for a reply from the ‚ÄúReserveHotel/FastLink‚Äù department. It‚Äôs been 19 days and no one has replied to our emails. 

It‚Äôs so hard to get ahold of anyone from the hotel because they‚Äôre not even trained to tell you what‚Äôs going so they keep transferring you to someone else until they just hang up on you. The sad part is that , we have a wedding coordinator and yet she couldn‚Äôt get a response for us from that department .

All so sweet.  \nThank you to the staff and fellow tourists for making our trip so much fun.  And, the pooches.  If you go (and you should) hugs and Lovins to the 4 legged kids out there.  We will be back there next year.  Very clean rooms and always up kept grounds.  Can't wait to be back. üíó", 'time': 1581899762}, {'author_name': 'Crystal Catalina', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115029425560361805520/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-zxjjxRu7VI0/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckXtgsrxhUuCpY25GXTQeKBP9QeUg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '9 months ago', 'text': 'I did not stay here overnight, but took a scuba lesson for discovery dive in the beautiful pool. Fabulous location for actual dive site near Los Arcos', 'time': 1575421024}, {'author_name': 'Diane Hutton', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102003051926672078007/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiQvMnlrWAbogdG5Vb-k7gWpF2uDcrmG5v8ItLcQA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': "Cada Iguana is a quiet hotel tucked away in a little paradise. We enjoyed sitting on our balcony watching the parrots, other exotic birds and iguanas in the tree canopy across the street.  If you are a birdwatcher, this place is for you. The stream that follows the road under the trees has a waterfall that you can hear and can't help but relax. Hotel rooms are clean and simple with a turquoise color theme and solid wooden furniture.  The balconies, grounds and pools are beautifully manicured . Patio furniture,  umbrellas, and dining area are all clean and newer looking. Front desk staff is friendly , bilingual and available 24 hours. Maid service is offered daily, friendly staff and soft bed sheets! Breakfast buffet offers fruit, pancakes, and all the traditional Mexican food entrees. Complete dinner menu with limited bar selections. We enjoyed a beautiful dinner and sunset at the Boca de Mismaloyal private resort on the beach. They allow outside dinner guests. The Catholic  church is right behind the hotel with Sunday service at 9:30 am. We will definitely return to this jungle paradise again. The Garden of Eden Canopy tours are 3 blocks behind the hotel and the Botanical Gardens are 9 kilometers away down highway 200. We plan to do both of these.", 'time': 1581796634}]

user_ratings_total_y:
[{'author_name': 'Almara Tahmasian', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104907983305357464902/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-RZaHfw6OrCU/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucldg61SUrDmsWO0UcWVbYI2kIggTg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Very respectful staff, loved our stay there, also they went out of their way to keep everywhere sanitized and minimize the risk', 'time': 1595628083}, {'author_name': 'Preston Marks', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110066257407344182555/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-1Gjm8930OQk/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmEpnT4lpi0EEIyOyBzxAK64aa4-Q/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'in the last week', 'text': 'My first night here I accidentally broke glass plates that were left in the hallway as I was returning to my room. 
Instead of the staff helping me with the accident, the staff separated me from my friends and called the ‚Äúpolice‚Äù where I was handcuffed, robbed, driven to an atm and forced to give my pin, and later kicked to the streets with my suitcase, where I was once again robbed. 
The police left me with no phone, no money, stolen property, and physically harmed. This was the ‚Äúpolice‚Äù the staff called. . The staff wouldn‚Äôt let me talk to my friends in the hotel when i was able to find a generous taxi driver to take me back to the resort after being robbed. My friends were being told ‚ÄúI was in jail.‚Äù 
Why were there dirty dishes left in the hallway anyways? Accidents happen. I was able to go into the hotel the next day to tell my friends what happened and I was removed from the hotel with no way of communication to my friends still in the resort. 
And of course no refund of my 10 night stay. They will take advantage of Americans.', 'time': 1598979318}, {'author_name': 'Ron Long', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106608102155929803722/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Giql3vw-G_QHzHam68SQB1yGTBDbs5SKF9aRMEjUhE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': "Incredible resort hotel.  All inclusive, adults only.  All rooms have an ocean view.  The staff is excellent and the on site restaurants are wonderful.  Can't wait to come back.", 'time': 1595199374}, {'author_name': 'Daniel Urbanczik', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117994862065356019307/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Ggv2e31maniW8oyOGn5IK3MKpJIAsaVZnNsR9qjtQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '3 weeks ago', 'text': 'The Grand Fiesta Americana Resort in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico 

To The Grand Fiesta Americana Resort staff especially to the restaurant service staff we would like to say thank you so much for making our stay pleasant and enjoyable. Everyone from the front desk to the housekeeping was excellent. We really enjoyed the food and the premium liquor that was served in every location we paid little extra for the ultra premium liquor and we think it was well worth it. All the bartender were knowledgeable and attentive. Overall the stay excited our expectations again all the staff was superb but few went above and beyond to make our stay even more memorable. Juan in the lobby bar was really professional and pleasant he made many great recommendations once it came to mix drinks his own creation was the fiesta drink which was really good and refreshing. All the servers were really attentive in the lobby bar but Esperanza always made sure that our glasses were never empty, again all staff members at the lobby bar were amazing but Juan and Esperanza went above and beyond for us and pretty much all the other hotel guests that were around in the lobby bar. In the dinning places all the food was excellent and well prepared and well seasoned the presentation of the food on the plate was really nice we were taken care of really well in every restaurant we dinned in. We had a superb service at the shore grill restaurant during lunch when we were seated with Daniel, he was our server many times and he always went above and beyond with our requests. Daniel is a great addition to the resort and a hard worker and again when I looked around the restaurants all the staff was amazing to the guests! But Daniel was just amazing to us. Our first day having breakfast we had the pleasure of being served by Francisco (in case there is few servers with that name, he is the one with dark farmed glasses) the second day at breakfast Francisco knew what kind of drinks we had the first day and he offered them to us again, I think that was fantastic way of showing appreciate and a great service to the guests of the resort. 
At the pool we had a great pleasure of being served by Omar!! He was simply amazing guy! Super super attentive and also made sure our glasses were never empty, we sat at the same spot at the pool area just so we can be served by Omar, He is amazing and hard working guy. All of the interactions we had with the restaurant staff, front desk, pool bars/staff was just executional in every way possible. It‚Äôs true that people will not remember what was said to them, but they will never forget how someone made them feel and all the staff at The Grand Fiesta Americana made us feel like we were part of their family, the staff took care of us and provided one of the best experiences we had on a vacation. In addition to the great service we would also like to add the amount of care and precautionary safety measures that were implemented at the resort. We felt really safe staying at the resort, everything was clean every table was whipped down in front of us when we sat down every dish had a cover on it to protect the food and every staff member had a mask and a face shield covering we though the protective measures very done extremely well.

The only issue we had was more with the resort itself very pushy sales pitch about the timeshare that was being offered by the Grand Fiesta Resorts and it felt like your staff had to be very harsh with selling it to your guests. We think that this sales pitch should not be that vigorous and intense. We were asked to see someone regarding the timeshare the very first day we arrived after checking with the front desk. The approach after getting our keys did not feel like a relaxing atmosphere we felt bombarded to sign up for timeshare right after checking in, and especially after a tiring long day of flying almost the whole day the last thing you want is to be pressured into signing up for extremely pricy timeshare.', 'time': 1597258593}, {'author_name': 'Dewayne Moneypenny', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109998462288802202615/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GhcdvNnwav6wtOdYCA5VMGoLTGnFYyleESNWvrfeg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '2 months ago', 'text': 'Was a great and outstanding Resort, I will will return.  Staff is outstanding,  Resort was past what I expected.

Due to Covid19 many tours was shut down and some of the bars closed witch is understandable.   

Overall a great experience.', 'time': 1593425494}]

Neil the owner would not compensate us for any of the issues. Wifi did not work consistently work so we had to sit on the corner of the porch and log into Park Royal's free wifi. DO NOT BOOK this place. Not worth it!!", 'time': 1510964557}, {'author_name': 'Christie Clifford', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106450107932763719211/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-hWqllP4MAsY/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclJT5RcUxXoylJ393vX5a386wmORg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '2 years ago', 'text': 'If I could review just the inside of this condo it would be 5/5 stars, but I can\'t. The amount of construction here is staggering. The description in the condo\'s advertisement is at best misleading. Dishonest is more accurate. I believe the owner writes about construction in the area. What he really means is 15 feet from your window. It\'s the beginning of a multi-year project with 60 foot pile drivers, excavators, and jack hammers. Literally 7 days a week from 8:00am to 7:30pm. The noise is overwhelming. Even with all doors and windows closed, even at the pool or beach. You are absolutely compelled to leave the premises during daylight hours. Again, the level of noise cannot be overstated. There is also construction within the condo that renders the elevators inoperative. This construction is extremely loud as well.\xa0\nRather than deal with our legitimate issues, the owner would not make any reasonable concessions for our inconvenience. His responses ranged from opaque to argumentative. Rather than let him again minimize our concerns, I will simply post a  Youtube video we created which highlights the construction and elevator issues. Simply youtube search "condominios las penas puerto vallarta".\nThe fact that this owner continues to advertise his condo while obfuscating the construction and elevator problems is highly unethical and lacking in integrity. He is obviously not interested in your vacation or your well being - just your money.', 'time': 1516655816}]
price_level_y: nice condo right on the beach  customer service was great when i stayed there  it isn t near downtown so it s not really a party area  but if you re looking for a peaceful place to fall asleep listening to the ocean this is it   recently stay in unit  it was well appointed and a good size for our party  lovely covered patio overlooking the pool and ocean  we saw whales from our unit  easy swimmingsnorkeling in the ocean and plenty of birds to watch including pelicans  i recommend this place  quiet and clean too   what a contrast to the overcrowded resorts and hotels of the area  shared the pool and beach with what seemed like at most to other families  perhaps due in part to the post holiday season  im sure also part of it is that this is a modestly sized condominium complex  regardless it was a fantastic place to enjoy both the local beach and only about minutes away from the more popular tourist destinations via uber  we recently stayed in  of this condo unit  where to begin first they weren t expecting us so the place was dirty and hot  plus no working elevators  construction noise from them working on the elevators as well as construction next door at park royal we couldn t even hold a discussion in the pool because of the loud construction  jack hammering and drilling  we were getting noise from morning til evening on both sides of the condo  the a c went user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'bill heil', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116787066478567855662/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.ggpht.com/-NVMaUW7YU-Y/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/dUH-kT_gfDE/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Great house but chef stole from us:\nHouse was fantastic the help was great this was a great vacation and would have come with a 5 stars until we got ready to leave and was told we had not payed one of our grocery bills. We had paid it the night before and handed the money to the chef. When our ride was waiting on us the morning of departure she said we had not paid it. We ended up double paying a 850.00 grocery bill which ruined the trip for us. I would not use this management company or the Chef Mara. The rep from the management company just stood there and did nothing. We were very generous and left a generous tip. But felt like we were set up as we had to catch a flight and she sprung this on us while our transportation was waiting. She said nothing about it in the morning as we paid her the 35.00 for the final grocery bill. If you choose to use this place make sure you have them sign off daily when you pay them, I would not have expected this at a luxury retreat like this. We had 5 couples and the house is fantastic as I said. Unfortunately what was a great vacation was ruined by dishonest people and dishonest management company.\nPlease feel free to contact me if you want more details', 'time': 1581707632}, {'author_name': 'Anthony Acampora', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111098486721513058919/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.ggpht.com/-rrY60yCWPkE/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/uPaFK1puZa4/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '4 months ago', 'text': "The property was incredible and immaculate, but that was only the tip of the iceberg. My mother has trouble walking stairs so she was able to walk down one flight at the beginning of the week and stayed on the main level after that. It was perfect for her to have a bedroom on the same level as the pool and kitchen. The views were spectacular, but the people made it a truly unforgettable experience. From our interaction with Carla at Agave Villas (the management company) getting us set up and keeping in touch with us daily to help with anything we needed to Carlos and Mari who made us feel like the most special guests they had ever had (I'm sure we were). Even the nice lady who cleaned for us every day had a smile on her face the whole time. I just can't say enough about working with Agave Villas. Even if you do not rent this house, I would work with them. We will be coming back and are already planning our next trip.", 'time': 1588361070}, {'author_name': 'Abraham Bravo', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117295963365896511526/reviews', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.ggpht.com/-O9bs-KgoigE/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/jE1HfVbMM0U/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': '', 'time': 1580621441}]
