[{'author_name': 'Omar Laguna', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102070198634887750767/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-7NhlPIAM2ac/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckLz08HBu2qW3Zdum-csGE5A47G2g/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Took FOREVER to check in/check out AND to get our car from valet parking. If you like wasting time on vacation go here!', 'time': 1595746119}, {'author_name': 'Katherine Rueda', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105400027385897823829/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjH_Wvt6AZg0Kob9khIJpC-f3696dcd_ocekt6LPA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'Amazing for my family (with my husband, 3 children and my parents). We stayed 2 weeks from March 6th to 21st, 2020. 
The weather was perfect. Not too heated and no rains ... yeah!!!

Loved all the people (from our daily room service, restaurants, bar, kid‚Äôs Club, the Golf campus, the tennis instructor, etc).

My boys did for their first time in their lives during this vacation: scuba diving class in the pool, tennis classes in their new tennis courts and practiced golf with all the gear rented for. Very affordable price. 
My lovely 2.5 year old daughter loved the water splashes off course.
We all enjoyed the foam pool party with big floaters, the food, the night theme parties, the night Kids theme party too.

During the Wednesday evening Kid‚Äôs party organized by the Kid‚Äôs Club my kids had a blast. With a large number of staff serving them, security watching over them and dancing, playing, and eating. 
Thank you so, so much.

God bless you all', 'time': 1586030682}, {'author_name': 'Rick Weber', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109967236243891418966/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gge8CQnZ7zMPrXup_x9-inF4G7xDMfajSwI5G6I=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'My family came here because it came recommended by friends who said the pools were great.  The first two days went good, the pool by Samba restaurant was our favourite because it was the warmest.  The third day we went down to the pool it was very cool so much so that no one in our group would set foot in it.  All the other pools were much cooler then the previous days as well.  Since we came to this hotel to swim I decided to go speak with the concierge to inquire.  He told me the pool was heated by the sun and it was out of his control.  I then asked why the previous days had been so warm considering the temperature outside was a consistent 28¬∞C every single day.  He just stared at me and said enjoy your day there is nothing I can do.  The following days were just as cold in the pools. If you like consistent pool temps don‚Äôt go here.
We also found that if you walked down the beach to the Sea Garden all of the restaurants outside of the resort were less than half the price of dining on resort.  If the hamburger was 350 pesos on resort it was 175 pesos off resort same as beer and other drinks.  When the pool was warm I was happy to sit by it and pay inflated prices but as the pools got cooler we spent less time on resort. Please do yourself a favour and stay somewhere else you‚Äôll be thankful for it even though the pools are amazing who wants to swim in coldness.', 'time': 1582641082}, {'author_name': 'Jesus Granados', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114858302593246441778/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-5JuY9IPlfDo/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuckum8UIALj6ksIh0OAp4blFs_49TA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '9 months ago', 'text': "I'm absolutely disappointed in this location for a number of reasons we have been racial profiled at this location and singled out . We had been at the pool at this location for about an hour when a life guard and e security personal approached me and asked for a day pass , I  had no idea of what he was talking about because it was never explained to us that we needed day passes to visit any of their pools . So let explain to you what this is this is a resort with allot of hotels on one property and when we checked in non of this was explained to us upon checking in so apparently if you stay at one hotel you are bound  to that hotel and the only way for you to use any of the other pools you need to take tours so that they can try and sell you time shares to their other locations here on there compounds . After I had put a complaint on their staff and told them that I was not not the only person that did not know about this  the concierge named Esteban tried to feed me a bunch of lies as to why they could not allow us to get day passes and proceeded to remove us from the pool and after my complaint they began to approach more and more families that just goes to show if I didn't complain we would have been the only ones removed I feel so racially profiled and discriminated against I cant believe that a four diamond resort would be capable of such a thing . Thank you for the great hospitality, and making us feel really welcome , so dissatisfied and disappointed!!", 'time': 1574890336}, {'author_name': 'kimberly ross', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102910857771857829427/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-w5vTUTOLQYM/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclk9pqDdSeZC0bL1r-689byT3jd4A/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'Love this resort! Extremely friendly staff, warm clean pools, and lazy river. We travel here at least once per year.', 'time': 1579015304}]

opening_hours: Mayan Palace at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta
price_level_x: Boulevard Riviera Nayarit 254, Nuevo Vallarta
rating_y: Mayan Palace at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Jose Moreno', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114871617965342054675/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GihM8Psbb-cZ-0t0BA2Qw98NFPW175HVh7LmBCpBg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Is a very nice place to spent quality family time, huge pools with water falls, lady river, activities and beach front', 'time': 1595979734}, {'author_name': 'Scott Christensen', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117285118703625874878/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GgEcxn_gHacGuYvDzDgoS6lpmoB5DZlf8EJ6VO4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '5 months ago', 'text': 'so this room was considered a one bedroom suite. but we got in late it took 1.5hrs from check in to getting to your room. they keep keep shuffling you from person to person to get you to sign up for a free "breakfast" which is there timeshare presentation. so we said no and no. you will get a discount to save on food and things but I have heard it will take 4-8hrs of your time so a day lost to a free breakfast. other then that the staff was super friendly and on point with any needs we had. our sink broke and maintenance was there within the hour to fix it. room was cleaned every other day which I am ok with. and the room was alway clean. the beds are super comfortable. we did not get an ocean view room but the and there really isn\'t a balcony it only a space to step out on. but the sliding glass doors open big enough to feel like you are sitting outside. as when we went Mayan Palace Pool is under Maintenance so we use The Bliss pool which is a good pool. its easy to get around if you have issues walking but if you want to walk to everything you are centrally located to the resort. we averaged on the resort 8k steps some less some more. I would happily stay here again. I forgot to mention if you get a one bedroom suite you can fit comfortably 4 people and 6 tightly as the beds is king size and the could is wide enough to sleep on and there are pull out beds under the couch just as wide as the couch.', 'time': 1584988093}, {'author_name': 'Zena Kinne', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106332854568440863336/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-Yq-qyeRP8zk/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnvsGBLgFWv6JnyDnyOtcGcHzuTtw/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'Room was well appointed with excellent bed, tub, and shower. Twice a day maid service. Excellent system of pools, including lazy river to float around. Plenty of restaurants to use from. Cooking utensils in kitchen limited but manageable. Went to the Rivera farmers market, open on Tuesdays, for fresh fish, fruits & vegetables, and cheese.', 'time': 1579977380}, {'author_name': 'favs a', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109314595975384793917/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjADfQH1Daa3NclhbbUhVeVxC5vcTzFMZtxijq0AA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3', 'rating': 4, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'stayed at resort down the beach, where able to use amenities for the day. loved the pools, lazy river and 2 for 1 drinks not bad at all. some guests were snobs but u get that every now and then. def a good spot for kids\n golf discount tonight lookn forward to it. also Havana club for buffet outstanding', 'time': 1581983912}, {'author_name': 'Richard Mercer', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103502055367204084453/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-kdPCNN98ar8/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclQ2omhOV-E2ztOCpra0dq6HEjt2g/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': 'Booked a week in the Mayan Palace  few weeks ago and left after 23 hours. Our room was no better than a motel. Bed, dresser, and a TV, nothing else. No chair to sit in the room or the small deck.Never did see  pool although we walked for about 13 minutes in the direction but just said scre2 it. Had to take shuttles everywhere and taxis to get off the property was a small fortune every time you wanted to leave. Costs for everything were just short of usuary. I appreciate that there has to be a profit made but seriously, when you are charged 110 pesos  for a beer that you can get anywhere for about 20 25 pesos, makes you shake your head.So, to sum up, if you want to stay a place that makes you feel like sheep and sucks every penny at every turn from your wallet...this is the spot.', 'time': 1579200673}]

opening_hours: Grand Luxxe at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta
price_level_x: Boulevard Riviera Nayarit 254, Nuevo Vallarta
rating_y: Grand Luxxe at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta
user_ratings_total_y: [{'author_name': 'Jake Pankoff', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113963955192630606448/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-YBdEpSDy4LY/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuuclkueH5cfCGppKnjm3sS3ztDddadQ/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': 'a week ago', 'text': "One of my favorite places to visit, and a great family destination. We have visited several times, and will continue to in the coming years. The facility at the Grand Luxxe is great, but the entire campus in Nuevo Vallarta is amazing too. It literally feels like a Disney World style campus with all the local hotels, and pools owned by the same entity. Couldn't recommend this place enough.", 'time': 1598333458}, {'author_name': 'The Bob', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100291914976391542217/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-ZzGA7P0uooA/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnbKJ6RkCy6Vn6iT8MjSAiKAIyjOg/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': 'a month ago', 'text': 'Horrible service. On the first day the lobby concierge messed up our reservation and they made us wait there for about three hours for them to identify where they messed up. On the second day, we ordered some groceries from outside the resort because everything here is very expensive. Then the concierge didn‚Äôt let the groceries pass and they didn‚Äôt let us get it through as luggage for no reason. Remember that this resort is REALLY expensive, so you expect a service that complies with that price tag, and yet the service is HORRIBLE. Shame on Vidanta.', 'time': 1594502968}, {'author_name': 'Chris P', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106604303961764609750/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-xPH83uuC1AU/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucnXGd6FBFIWczRP8hfmkXBxyv20Nw/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '7 months ago', 'text': "Resort is in disrepair, service is HORRIBLE, they lie, etc. It took us 35 minutes to get from our room to the beach since the shuttle service was VERY slow and it seems like half the resort is under construction for years. The tennis courts have been closed for months - no tennis at a massive resort! Wave pool hardly works and is freezing. And we have only been here a day - I'm sure we will learn about more problems daily!  The are SUPERB at taking your money and cheating you though. Don't do a presentation since they tell you many things that are not true and apply more pressure than I have ever experienced. Avoid!!!", 'time': 1581205226}, {'author_name': 'Andrew S.', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104372197922155800623/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-5UF3OtHMcaU/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/AMZuucmZ5vxPngui4ytJfVFd49KI3eL4JA/s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo/photo.jpg', 'rating': 1, 'relative_time_description': '8 months ago', 'text': 'This resort is a glorified prison. Staff is not helpful at all and could care less if you have to wait 15+ minutes for transportation to come get you, otherwise you are stuck walking to other facilities which takes even longer. Facilities are very nice but the resort is a maze. Time share presentation that was supposed to be 1 hour took 4 hours, with 6 different salesman trying to get my family to buy a timeshare. Finally, and worst of all, the resort advertises on all of their materials that they have 12 tennis courts that are lit at night. This was going to be great for my family as we are all tennis players. However, when we got to the resort, we quickly realized they have absolutely no tennis courts. WHAT A SCAM. There is no accountability at this place. This is fraud and false advertisement at its highest, and they get away with it. I don‚Äôt get why so many people love this place. Avoid this prison and go somewhere else. This place gets a 1 star for the abhorrent fraud they commit', 'time': 1576861841}, {'author_name': 'Peter Heinen', 'author_url': 'https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100389383542407553093/reviews', 'language': 'en', 'profile_photo_url': 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiQEcagmN_31n-Qz7TGMHnjWmJLeuU7KdKc7KzCUw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4', 'rating': 5, 'relative_time_description': '6 months ago', 'text': 'Opulent. Similar to a theme park, everywhere is an experience. Staff omnipresent to tend to a whim. Not all inclusive, but for those with a little money set aside for a trip, as good as it gets', 'time': 1582581533}]
